a must do!. seeing the beauty of the city from the river is definitely a must-do, and the cruise was well organized and pleasant. definitely recommended!
Great. The overall experience was lovely. I highly recommend this to everyone. The boat and staff were amazing.
A mindmap to budapest. A great variety of drinks suitable for every taste were served twice . Staff were very nice and familiar with english .

Beautiful. Budapest at night is beautiful but it depends on your seat on the boat. Since there are a lot of people, it is good to arrive early to take a good seat and see and take photos of the most beautiful sites.
Have to get there early to get a good spot. Have to get there early to get a good spot since the window is not that big or wide. Good drinks and service though.

Lovely way to spend an evening. This is a really nice way to spend an hour - we did it on our last night in Budapest, and it was a great way to finish a lovely holiday. The tour lasts about an hour, and a drink (wine/champagne etc) is included in the price of the ticket. Definitely worth waiting until it's dark to really appreciate the city at night. The company also run a dinner cruise service which looked lovely!

Good value. Choose this from the many offered as the boat looked the nicest with comfy leather seats. Great way to get photos of the famous buildings. Staff were all friendly , helpful & attentive. Good value for money as it included a drink too for the HUF3900 per person.
Donau by night. Simply fantastic and wonderful in any way - both view and dinner was marvelous - and the staff did everything in their power to give us an evening far better than expected :-)
Legenta. It was really great. The service was nice and the story about Budapest was also wonderful. I recommend it to everyone.

Best ferry tour. Compared to other tours, the Legenda is faster and larger, and is much more quiet and less crowded. Also therr is hardly any waiting with reservation. Complimentary drinks are also a plus. The tour itself is also longer than other tours.
Lovely cruising. One of the many things I fell in love with in Budapest. Every tourist must do it at least once during his visit to this beautiful city.

A nice way to discover Budapest's best buildings. This cruise on the Danube allows to discover Budapest from another point of view. A recorded guide explains the history of the city and its buildings.

Food Poisioning. Myself and My girlfriend both had food Poisioning the morning after the cruise. We were both ill for three days.
I was recommended your cruise by a friend! Very Disappointing!!
Glorious Danube. Very good boat trip giving us the chance to see lots of sights in the comfort of the boat with a glass in our hands.

Great views and dinner. An evening dinner cruise showed the Danube banks and buildings at their most stunning when lit at night.
The food and wine were good and the service attentive

Nice boat trip. It was very nice trip, there was very good program on tv, arranged according to boat's route, explaining details of those historical building while the boat is just next to this building, with a nice drink service..

No papers needed. Our tickets were preordered on the internet. I forgot to print it, but the email was good too at the check in.
The costumer service was professional.
Great job!

Nice trip, good food, well organized. Everything was well organized. We purchased ticked incl. 4 course dinner through web sites (it is good value for money because you can choose anything from menu), boarding was smooth, all tables are next to windows/glass wall. Dinner was served without any mistakes and delays, drinks and wine are not overpriced. Food was quite good. We had enough time to see all main lighted monuments several times. I highly recommend this trip.

Just about OK. After going around budapest for 2 days with a guide and car... I thought the boat ride was not much of a ideal thing to do. they just tell you the same things that you have experienced earlier. Nevertheless... it was a smooth sailing ride... staff was pleasant... quick 60 mins ride.
Night in the Danube. A great way to enjoy the beauty of Budapest at night - The Parliament, Cave Church, Buda Castle,etc. Just the right amount of time to spend on a very nice boat. Highly recommend!

Quite enjoyable boat ride. I think it is a bit to expensive for what it is, but the views were formidable. The audioguide was ok, but rambled a bit to much for me. Overall I enjoyed it and it was a nice experience
It was amazing. I really enjoyed the spectacular view especially during the night! The city just dazzels and shimmers at night 😊 Would love to do it again ... K-10

Lovely evening on the Danube !. A delightful dinner cruise.with very good food and wine. The sights were breathtaking. This was the highlight of our stay in Budapest. The only downside was the music. A very old gentleman who only sang one word out of five and sounded like a very drunk Charles Aznavour. Better, surely, to have more modern music played through a sound system??
Great night on the Danube River. Really nice night only complaint is the upper deck PA announcements where terrible loud but great cruise and dinner was excellent

Ladies night out. We booked six exclusive dinner tickets for the Saturday evening cruise.It was our main event during our ladies' long weekend in Budapest, and it was amazing.The evening started with a glass of champagne, or wine, followed a four course meal. There were lots of different meals chosen, and everyone was happy with their choice and the quality of the food.There was a musician playing quiet jazz music, which allowed us to chat, have fun and enjoy the scenery.All in all, it was a good evening. Highly recommended.

City tour on the Danube. We had no major concerns with the City tour on the Danube with Legenda. They have what appear to be 3 boats of which one was fitted out for their Dinner cruise (book early for this one as they sellout quick, we missed out on this). We were on the older one of the fleet with limited outside seating. Majority on the upper level was covered but they had an open view to the outside as the glass panels were drawn back. Their other boat for sightseeing had the entire upper level open but I guess it depends on your own personal preference. The electronic guide system is informative and clear. I was impressed with the number of languages available. Embarking and disembarking was well organized. The washroom at the ticket office location was small but very clean. I would recommend Legenda. We went with the recommendation made by the hotel we were staying at the Boscolo Budapest and weren't dissapointed.
Fantastic evening views of Budapest. Great evening views of famous landmarks straddling the Danube in Budapest. Definitely recommend the outside deck even if it's chilly for unobstructed views.

Great Job. Very interesting sights well shown. Good boat captain and driver and staff. Seats and boat clean and in good working order. Drinks and Lemonade fine and a good time was had by all. We saw change from Sun to night lights which were beautiful..Jerry Laurie
Not so good. Headphones not functioning properly, service not so well organized. Dusty seats. Overall not well satisfied

Excellent staff, great tour. My wife and I took a river tour which was classed as a daytime tour. It was actually half daytime and half night time.The staff were great and the view was superb.There was a minor issue when my translation box did not work in English but the staff fixed the problem in seconds.Each box has two headset outlets and my headset was simply plugged into the second outlet of the box which worked properly.I missed none of the commentary. The ship was clean and comfortable and as described above the staff rectified a potential problem very efficiently.The tour was great. The commentary was very informative, all contributing to a great afternoon/evening.Henry
excellent. Lovely meal Staff very pleasant and efficient Music good Whole experience very good from start to finish

Fantastic evening. We had a fantastic evening, full of good good food, fantastic service og great live music. Would recommend it to all, that would like a romantic candle light dinner, with some great scenarie from Donau full og lights.

Very romantic candelight dinner on Danube. This was a big splurge for my husband's birthday, but worth it. The food was terrific. The wine included was okay (not outstanding). To buy an extra glass of wine was not as expensive as I'd expected. The keyboardist was terrific. The only drawback was the singer, who was off key the entire time, and looked like she'd just broken up with her boyfriend or something -- a pasted-on smile when she remembered it. For what they're charging, can't they get a decent singer?

Good Food and Good Service - very nice cruise. Only downside was the table we had was not ideal. We asked for a different table but they wouldn't move us.Despite that, a very nice cruise with good food and good service.
Excellent tour. We took a tour which included dinner. We really enjoyed the evening. Food was delicious and the staffs were very polite and really took good care of us.

evening boattrip on the Danube River. The boat trip lasted for prox. one hour. It was just long enough to see the beautiful highlights of Budapest by night. The view from the boat was great and everyone had a good view on all the lit up monuments, churches and buildings.
It was cool. It was really cool and we liked it.Its really nice here and a nice City.We think we will come back here.

An enjoyable outing on the Danube. Lights on the surrounding buildings spectacular; while drinks were included in price, quality wasn't great...perhaps better to have better selection for purchase and encourage that practice. With a busy (full) shipload of guests, by the time we received our drinks, we were approaching the final docking. Probably too difficult a task for onboard staff for adequately serve all guests. Otherwise, we enjoyed the outing...and it was fairly priced.
good boats with helpful crew. a good cruise which meets expectations...good audio, decent seating, nice champagne and warm staff....
Budapest 19 september. Very good, but on the afterdeck the tv-screen was annoying, to bright and distracting of the nicely led buildings.

Return To Budapest. We had booked for the evening cruise with dinner and arrived on time and were shown to a lovely table on the top of the boat. There were only 6 tables on the top.The evening was like black velvet and we enjoyed a most delightful cruise, up & down the river, with a lovely meal, served by pleasant staff, enjoying the night views which were spectacular. Very romantic and highly enjoyable, particularly with the protective glass dome pushed fully back. recommended

Beautiful city from Danube. We took the 7.30pm tour and saw this beautiful city from the water in the dark. It only takes and hour and you get to see most of the beautiful sights with short tour. They also serve you a glass of wine while you are enjoying the sights. The only disappointment was in the quality of the information provided by the audio guide, there were plenty of long pauses which could be used for more informative tour.

Best boat in Budapest . We had a very nice sightseeing trip with Legenda. Got a glass of wine on the start of the trip. And a glass of lemonade after we left the island. This is some of be newest and most modern boats on the river there. So do it. A perfect way of seeing the sights from the river. And perfect locations just beside the Marriott hotel.

Brilliant value. Went on Danube river cruise with Legenda on 16 September in the afternoon and it was brilliant from start to finish. Very reasonably priced, and with multi-language headset commentary. We stopped off at Margaret Island to investigate Japanese Garden, then caught boat back. Free glass of prosecco on the way down and lemonade on the way back. Friendly staff. Would recommend going in the daytime so that you see all the sights (rather than being distracted by a meal).

Great trip!. Wondeful services. Internet reservation is perfect as the sailing. Personell is so kind and friendly. Everything is explained in perfect way in your own language. Very interesting is the General explanation of monuments by audio-guide.
Great!. Was everything it advertised, food and drink was amazing, great service and awesome views of the city at night

Beautiful . We researched different types of sightseeing boat tours and decided on this one.it was easy to find from our hotel and we went and booked our tour in the afternoon on our way past. I would recommend wrapping up and sitting outside on the top, the views were amazing. About halfway through someone came and took our drinks order and then shortly after came back with them. My audio box changed language on me twice other than that no complaints.

River Dinner Cruise... Must do!! . I pre bought tickets for the 7.45 river dinner cruise before I went! Turned up 20 mins before and was taken through the boat by one of the girls! Down stairs was looking quite full and I was a bit worried about where we would be seated but to my surprise we were taken upstairs! It was only tables of 2, and very narrow so each table had a window seat! We were given our arrival champagne and ordered food! I advised I needed gluten free and that wasn't an issue! They even supplied gluten free bread with no pre warning which was a really nice surprise!! Overall the food was all good!! Up till the river cruise I hadn't experienced any good service at all in Budapest so didn't have high hopes but no, the waitresses were so attentive, polite and just wanted to do anything they could to help you! The views are just wow! There is nothing more beautiful than Budapest at night!! It is a little expensive at about £55 each for the all inclusive which doesn't include drinks! But the views and overall experience make up for it! If you want something special to remember your Budapest trip you can't miss out on this! Highlight of our trip!
A Nice journey on the Duna. Great welcome, Nice Journey with comments, Two glasses and a possible stop at Margaret Island. Great moment !

Amazing night cruise with spectacular views!. Would highly recommend this to any couple for a romantic meal by candlelight.Food and service were excellent as were the views.There was a live band with a solo female artist who had a wonderful voice and sang both new and old songs. Very romantic!If I were back in Budapest, I would definitely do the night cruise again. For the equivalent of £60pp, you get your money's worth!

Night time river cruise. The boat was nice and the view of night time Budapest was amazing. We also did get one free drink . I got one small beer. I preferred a bigger glass but OK. The guide was also in Estonian, what was really a nice surprise. The taxi drivers in Budapest at least in night time are real robbers. They will charge you ridiculous sums of money. Not what is written on their price list.

Great weather, great evening to be on a boat. If you are a couple, you can sit upstairs where it is quite narrow and quite romantic as the few tables are spread out. A welcome glass of champagne is a nice touch. Live music downstairs which you can hear upstairs. Food was surprisingly good, we enjoyed it all, and a good value as well. Nice options for wines as well. the boat circles around a lovely area of the Danube (trust me we did a dinner cruise in Prague and it was not pleasant on that river at all). Downstairs are larger tables and it is covered, Blankets are provided for everyone.

Great!. Really enjoyed the cruise. The dock was easy to find (and close to metro stop Vorosmarty Ter) and there is a "lounge" where you can wait prior to boarding. An hour was the perfect length and the commentary was very informative :) Bring a jacket - despite it being 30 degrees during the day it got quite cold out on the water after the sun went down.If you are disabled I would just check with them, the way we embarked and disembarked was not disabled-friendly, but they might have a different option for those unsteady on their feet.

Best night ever!. Cannot say enough about this candlelight dinner cruise. Book early and guarantee yourself a window table and you cannot go wrong. We were amazed by how good the food was. This was our last night in Budepest and we are so happy we did this cruise. We booked the four course dinner and had just an amazing time. They even close the windows later if the evening begins to cool down. Do not miss this cruise.
Lovely tour with free drinks and wifi on board. Loved the river cruise tour. There is audio guide to listen to and there is also free wifi and drinks on board.

Great way to see Budapest!. We booked an evening cruise tour to see Budapest on our first night after we arrived. The tour was excellent and was available in a variety of different languages. Plenty of room on board so there were many opportunities for great photos. The views of Budapest from the boat were breathtaking. Staff were friendly and provided us with complimentary drinks. The historical highlights of Budapest were explained in detail. Would definitely recommend this cruise.

Celebrating our wedding anniversary. We had a wonderful evening celebrating our wedding anniversary.We had great seats on the top deck and the staff made us feel really special.Budapest is a wonderful city and magical by night.Certainly recommend Legenda
HG. Beautiful narration style of the history and development of the city. The use of male and female characters for Buda and Pest is quite interesting. Courteous staff and smooth ride.

Stunning night view. I did the evening sight-seeing tour, great way to see Budapest by night when everything is all lit up. The audio guide was informative and comes in different languages.Unfortunately it was raining when I went, so it kinda ruined the mood a bit and not many photo opps due to the weather. Overall, worthwhile doing if you have extra time in Budapest and definitely do the evening trip over the daytime ones.
Nice way to see the city!. Loved the views, and the audio guide throughout was well done. Love that we were able to stop at Margaret Island and enjoy the beautiful park with a bike ride.
Budapest Dinner Cruise. Magical views, outstanding food, nice people. No better way to spend a summer evening. I would do it every time I am in Budapest, weather permitting.

Excellent night. This cruise was fantastic. The staff were very friendly, the food was excellent and the entertainment was, well, entertaining. A really good night had by both myself and my boyfriend. Thoroughly enjoyed it and would definitely do it again.
Boat trip. Everything was perfect . Good service , nice and kind waitress . Easy to get in the ship , and get off .

Great experience. Spur of the moment we took a 1 hour sight seeing trip on the Danube and we were not disappointed - the commentary is entertaining and of course the sights are stunning. We sailed just after dark and both sides of the river were spectacular! Comfortable seats, friendly service and a complimentary beer too, a great way to spend an hour
Must do in Budapest!. Best time for it is at sunset, great light for pictures, magic atmosphere even better with the champagne served on board.
Don't miss. Elegant, fun, amazing food. There's live music that is just the right tune, the food was chef's level and the overall experience is amazing

Very nice trip. The price is quite economical for what it is. Especially the view of Budapest in the night is just amazing! A must do. We had a great time with Legenda service. Complementary drinks, possibility of recordings in many languages, comfort etc.
Legenda :(. The sightseeing is wondreful. The service of the boat and the restorant is nice. The food is average and extremely expensive. The wineas are also average with high prices.

An informative and fun ride between Buda and Pest. Legenda's cheap ticket price does not reflect the effort and thought that were put in a single experience on the Danube. The double decked boat offers a smooth and easy round trip to Margaret Island and back (with a free stay if you choose to do so), accompanied by complementary drinks (one for each leg of the trip) and an extensive audio guide in dozens of languages which follows the sights seen from the boat in your native tongue. It was a real sweet surprise to hear two professional actors play out an audio guide in our native language. Highly recommended. Don't forget to spend the afternoon on Margaret Island. It is worth every minute!
Great service and perfect view!. Service is great, food is also OK. We spent plenty of time on the river, the view is splendid! Recommended Legenda for the cruise.

The perfect way to see Budapest!. The boat was perfect for optimal sight seeing. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. And on top of that the food was delicious! I would strongly recommend this boat tour to anyone visiting Budapest.

Reasonable short tour of the river. This is a nice way to have a view of the highlights of the city in a short time. We took an afternoon tour and were offered drinks on the trip as part of the price. The electronic devices offer guide information in many languages. It is quite worthwhile for those visiting the city for the first time.
Good tour. I think it was a really good tour full of history and culture in multi languages with a very good service

Wow! Budapest on the Danube!. Overall, just a fantastic time on the Danube! Legenda's boat and route allowed superb views of both the Buda and Pest shores. Only comment is that other boats sometimes obscured the view, especially in front of the Parliament Building. It seems that the cruise boats would talk with each other so boats closer to the shore would not accelerate to pass our boat and block our view.

Everything that was expected. Nice boat, polite and friendly service, a free drink plus a lemonade.Very nice!I just wish our boat did not have a big TV (off) at the front of the upper section, blocking some of the forward view. Of course most of the scenery is on the sides, but it is nice to see forward.

Legenda Candlelight Cruise. Fantastic personal service from the moment you step aboard to disembarkation. A truly great way to celebrate our wedding anniversary, food, service, gentle live mood music and the magnificent Budapest night scenery.
Danue cruise. Easy to book. Reasonably priced Great staff . Lovely relaxed cruise. Would recommend for a great day cruise up and down the Danue to see the sights.
Budapest Romanza!!!!!!. What a beautiful time we had, soooo romantic and stunning backdrops.The staff were very attentive.I would definately recommend !!!!!!!

Honeymoon. Very kind crew,
Comfortable boat with great view even during rain
We loved the opportunity to stay at Margit Island
Lovely evening!. Extremely pleasant time enjoying beautiful evening lights of Budapest, along with a delicious meal (ala carte) and splendid service.

Good but wish there was a deck to stand and watch the sites.. Mainly for old people to sit and view the sites. Felt a bit constricted with rows of 4 on each side to sit. Would have been nice if we could stand on the top deck and just walk around.
evening river cruise. Great views of Budapest at night! The narration video is a little hokey, but has good information. One beer / wine included.

Very enjoyable. First visit to Budapest and wanted to have a boat trip to get our bearings, was just the trip we needed, very informative just a shame it was raining so we didnt get off to go on Margaret Island but cant help the weather.
The best river trip. The best boat & the best trip we did while in Budapest it also included 2 drinks which were lovely well worth the money

2nd anniversary present. Every information that I needed was on their website.The check in was quick and easy. The view was beautiful and our boat went on the best route. It was perfect and veeerry romantic.
Relaxing cruise. It's very nice cruise, you can see the city in the night and it's fantastic. You can relax and visit many monuments in the same time.
You can´t miss this trip. It shows perfectly the great river views during the night. First time I cry for watching a building. The Parlament. Unforgettable

Normal Sober Cruise on a River. A cruise that takes you a little south of the bridges and a little north above the Chain Bridge. Warning: we took a 6:30 (sunset for our time of year cruise) and it's just another boat that goes along the river. NO BAR. You get ONE free drink, but after that they have no means to serve you anything else. No cashier. No monies. Nothing. Do another cruise. At least they will have a bar.Jusque un cruise, comme d'autreSeulement un boisson gratuit, et après rien. Pasque il n'y a pas un cashier. Prenne une autre cruise.I confirmed, all their cruises are this way. The wifi didn't work for us as well. We connected but then after 20 minutes it wouldn't recognize it. We reset our caché, etc. Aussi, le wifi ne marche pas pour moi après 20 minut

Beautiful tour through the Danube river. We loved the tour through the Danube in Budapest with the company. The prices are fair, the boats are good, great staff. The refreshments served are also good. We highly recommend to stop at Margaret Island it's an amazing walk. We spent the entire afternoon there. And the boat is on time to take you back to Pest side. One observation was that one of the audio guides were not working but, since it was not full we could change places with no problem.
Very romantic. The tour was very romantic and relaxing, i thing that the evening tour is more suggestive because Budapest in the evening is full all lights!

Perfect Introduction to the city. I arrived in Budapest around 3pm on a Friday and had an hour sunset cruise booked for 7:30. I booked ahead of time and showed up about 15 minutes early. The check-in was right at the dock and very easy. The young women conducting the tour were very sweet and kind. The commentary provided a nice introduction to the sights. It was a very enjoyable hour and I highly recommend it.
Nice sightseeing of Budapest. You can truly get excellent views of Budapest buildings from the Danube. I recommend to go when gets dark and all the city lights comes out to play
Family holiday. Great service lovely boat rude. Grandma really enjoyed her birthday thanks to legenda. Would definitely recommend

Romantic yot dinner( yup, I know I spelt it incorrectly ). A very nice evening. Thanks crew. I had birthday cake!! Budapest is one of the most beautiful cities I've ever seen...and I've been around. Definitely a recommendation.

Perfect dinner cruise!. Every city with a river offers dinner cruises, but this one tops the list. Maybe because the evening's weather was perfect, maybe because the food was surprizingly good, maybe..... This cruise is a big winner!

Nice. A very pleasant experience - complementary drink provided and brought to you from the bar, attentive and well-spoken staff who are multilingual. The boat was in very good condition, and the experience was very enjoyable. Blankets were provided for those who wished to sit outside on the deck, and there was also viewing screens, an audio description, and music to accompany the cruise. Well worth the money to be able to see the sights - and especially beautiful at night.

Dinner Cruise. My daughter and I had a wonderful dinner cruise. The food was lovely and they even provided blankets as we were sitting on the top deck. We couldn't hear the live performer very well but that was a minor problem. Overall, we had a wonderful evening.
Excellent Evening. Fantastic candle lit dinner cruise along the Danube. Lovely food and wonderful sights to see. Great service also.
Duna cruise. Very relaxing experience! You can discover Budapest from other point of view in many languages. The crew was very gentle with us.

Somewhat strange commentaries, but very kind staff and ok wines on board!. The company is very reliable, they deliver what they promise. The wine on board (mainly Hilltop) is good on the white end, and the ambiance is fairly relaxed. The staff is young, easy going, but very curtious and thoughtful. They provide guiding in dozens of languages, but it is hard to come around the fact that much of the text is less than relevant for foreigners. Often it is not contextualized, therefore it must be hard to understand the true meaning, the historical references. Anyhow, if you had enough of the guide, just turn off your headphone, take a sip of the wine and enjoy the splendid view!

Evening Cruise Was WOW!. Legenda offers nice, clean, and comfortable cruises with easy to listen to audio. The views from the water are breathtaking. We are pleased with our choice of Legenda and felt the cruise was well organized. We appreciated the free soda/champagne and lemonade.
Couldn't have been better!. Everything was absolutely perfect! The atmosphere, the service, the food and most of all the scenery!

Candlelit Dinner Cruise. Excellent - wonderful experience, pleasant and professional staff, delicious dinner and complimentary glass of champagne. A must do when in Budapest and a real highlight of our trip ! Thoroughly recommended.
Beautiful view, good food, and live Jazz. Certainly a cruise for tourists, but worth the price for the 4 course dinner. It was fun and I would recommend the dinner cruise.
Take the evening cruise.. Very good service. These people are most accommodating. They couldn't be nicer. I give them Excellent marks.

Amazing trip and unforgetable memories. I was in Budapest with my GF and we finished our stay with Legenda Sightseeing and it was the best ending of our vacation. There is no flaws in this cruise. What I appreciate the most was the guide in our native language (Polish) that told us everything about attractions we visited days before. It made that cruise more in depth. I would recommend that sort of trip to everyone who visits Budapest.
Lovely service. Thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. The Marriot Hotel on the Danube was amazing and very helpful and we enjoyed the scenery.
Wonderful time. Took a day tour, spent an hour and a half on Margaret Island, then returned on the boat. The boat was lovely, comfortable and the crew was wonderful.
Boat trip. It was great! We have been with older child and baby.Children have enjoyed.especially sitting outside is a real pleasure
Budapest night tour. boat tour was very good. Content of video&audio was also good. Boat departes just a little late. boat itself was very nice.
The beautiful Danube. The night cruise on the Danube was beautiful seeing all the historic and magnificent buildings at night was excellent. Boat was good and staff efficient. Waiting area too small.
Very good!!. I visited 30 August, 2016 with my mother. View is very good, but dinner is soso.. Because bread is too hard. But i recommed here!❤️
Delightful. We went on the dinner cruise up and down the Danube in Budapest. Enjoyed all the lit up sites. Food as good as well.

A beautiful view of Budapest. We had a wonderful cruise along the Dabube during the day, we were given 2 drinks- one alcoholic and one OJ. There was a guided recording to listen to as we cruised past the wonderful sights of Budapest. High recommended and value for money.

Nice view ,food, live music and nice crews. It's out first time to visit Budapest and first cruise with Legenda Sightseeing Boats
And thanks to Legenda Kft, We will definitely visit budapest again in further future
Me and my wife will come again~

Magical. Beautiful trip , the narrative playing was really helpful , boat was comfortable , and an included cocktail .
Great experience all around .

A wonderful night cruise on the Danube. Having read about this company on TA and others we booked for an evening cruise on the Danube to see what Buda and Pest looked like illuminated at night, A very modern boat with a glass of wine to start you off was a really nice evening. Some of the sights are incredible, the only let down was Parliament was not fully illuminated. Very comfortable inside seating for a 21:00 sailing was a must, but it proved to be a false dawn. We really enjoyed the evening and highly recommend this tour.

Amazing Danube night tour!. What an amazing experience. Yes this is not the cheapest tour out there but it is worth it. We took the 9pm night tour which included a free drink and an audio tour in the price - I enjoyed a lovely glass of champagne while admiring the lights of Budaoest! The boat is very comfortable and was not too crowded, I was able to easily get a seat with a view. The audio guide is informative and is in many languages, and the tour takes you all the way down the Danube and then back up again, one of the highlights being Parliament all lit up.The only downside was some noisy women behind me loudly complaining about how grainy their pictures were but hey ho, life goes on! :')Even if it is a hot days during the day, you will want a jacket or another layer as it was very cold on the water! The staff can give you some very warm and very large blankets on request which were just lovely. Overall I would absolutely recommend Legenda boat tours over any of the cheaper options you might see, it was worth every Forint!

Very beautiful and interesting experience, for all who want to know more about Budapest. If you do not have much time in Budapest, this is a must. first, it is beautiful, second, it gives you a short overview of the history of the city and the most important sights. The ride is accompanied by a short film explaining what you are seeing. It is operated all day long and lasts 1 hour, which is just the right time. I personally recommend the night cruise, at night Budapest is even more beautiful.
Thanks giving a good opportunity!. My family and I really enjoied this attraction. We were inspiring!Weh had a good dinner too.I would like to utilize nex time when my family visit .

Nice staff and music. We showed up as a business group for dinner at early September 2016.Staff are quiet friendly and helpful, appetizers and main course where excellent, however wine choice was a bit limited. almost all kinds of beverages could be find on the boat and we enjoyed the view and live music very much.

Wonderful Dinner Cruise in Budapest. On our visit to Budapest we took advantage of a dinner cruise on the Danube to see the city from the water. Great experience and beautiful views. The staff were wonderful and made a perfect night on our vacation
very best. thank you very mach, you are the best. our family 4 persons(2+2) We enjoyed. Superb service, best route, just to say thank you, you're the best!

Beautiful sights, not truthful with their advertising. Yes, the sights from the boat were amazing (as they will be from any other ship in town, I guess). The narration and the video that they show during the trip are also pretty interesting (I don't know of they also offer this in the other boats...). What made the trip "uncomfortable" was the fact that, although they advertise they offer "Free Wi-Fi", they didn't specify that the wifi was without an internet access. Yes, I know that when you're a tourist with such nice sights is better to focus on them rather than on your phone, but if you offer a service and advertise it, you have to give it.

Without a doubt the best river cruise available . After to speaking to others who had been on the buffet cruises ours was amazing. We had champagne on arrival, a four course meal and the sides of the boat opened up so we could take some amazing photos without any glare through the windows!

Beautiful day cruise with drinks. We really enjoyed this cruise. The crew was very professional and pleasant. We got served 2 drinks (your choice on the way to the Margarite Island, and some Fanta type a drink on our way back). We payed 54 euros for 4 person. The ship is very clean and it has audio commentary to help you learn about Budapest's history (it comes in 30 languages). Would definitely go for this cruise again.

Enjoyable Dinner Cruise. I travelled to Budapest with a friend in August and we pre-booked our Legenda evening dinner cruise prior to leaving the UK. We were shown to our table on the open top deck and given our sparkling wine to drink while deciding on our menu choice. The waitress was very helpful and explained the choices. Other reviewers have said that the food was excellent but unfortunately we did not agree on this evening. I had pork which was very dry and my friend had the steak which was very tough. We enjoyed the dessert though. Wine is priced very reasonably. The cruise itself was fab and especially seeing all the land marks beautifully lit up. The live entertainment (a duo) was very good, heard through the speakers on the top deck, but not at all intrusive. Blankets are provided for the evening chill, which was very welcome. The glass 'cover' can be accessed by staff, either for a couple, or everyone, if it is too cold or raining. We braved it without! Very glad we booked the trip, hope our disappointing food was just a blip.

Legenda Sightseeing Boats. We took a day trip on the Danube. What a great way to see the city! The boat was clean and comfortable. We stopped on Margaret Island were we rented some bikes and lunched. We took a boat back a few hours later. It was great and I recommend this tour.

Beware of the Foods. The overall setting was good. However, as soon as we had the cold soup, one of our members started to have gastric. I suffered from gastroenteritis on the following day and had very bad tummy ache for three days.

Stunning Views But A Bit Disorganized. My teenagers and I enjoyed this cruise very much, and the views were gorgeous and surprising, but the whole process of showing tickets and getting on board was a bit disorganized. The previous cruise's passengers were still getting off at the same time as our group was trying to get on, which caused confusion and uncertainty. even the young ladies supposedly "organizing" the entering and leaving passengers on the gangway seemed uncertain as to when they could start permitting the new passengers on, since some of the previous ones were still milling about in the downstairs part of the boat. Maybe they should leave a bit more time between one cruise and another, or hustle the previous passengers off a little quicker, but they need to work on this. My younger son and I sat in the lower portion of the boat because at first we didn't realize there was an upstairs, but my other son shot upstairs immediately and got a great seat right on the edge of the boat and said it was much better than the seats downstairs. The complimentary drink was nice, though it came very late into the cruise as the wait staff have to serve so many people.

Excellent from start to finish. This was an anniversary present from our daughter and we had a fabulous night from start to finish terrific timing food was best we had entertainment just right staff were efficient so pleasant and couldn't do enough to help you enjoy the night to the full which they did A very classy night well done

Dinner cruise . We had an enjoyable evening dinner cruise with Legenda. Good service although we requested a move from the table we were allocated under the cover on top deck. It was too hot and stuffy so we moved back a table into the open air. This was a good choice. The unfortunate people who ended up on that table who arrived after us also complained. On a hot evening, the outside top deck was lovely compared to downstairs inside, but people with mobility issues struggled with the tight stairs. The food was good quality. The duck breast with cherries was fabulous. The brownie desert less so but I was full by then anyway. Yes, as other reviews we read before booking pointed out, the boat does circuit a few times up and down the river but who wants to be away from the lights of the city on a dark river? It was romantic and lovely. Recommended

Nice trip on the Danube. We had a very good time on the boat, the waitresses were very kind, the dishes were good. We did not have the menu, we took dishes directly from the card, it costs approximatively the same. There are blankets on the boat if you are cold. And the view of the monuments is very nice from the boat.
Great sights. The views of Budapest illuminated, from the boat and having a drink, were spectacular.It´s worth it.
Legenda boat Tour. This was an amazing evening with good food,music and service. I do recommend this Tour very much. Thanks for that nice evening
BUDAPEST WAS AMAZING AT NIGHT. The cruise was very pleasant, and Budapest has a stunning sight from the Danube at night. All the buildings were glow in light seems to be made of gold.

Wonderful time on the boat !. Our trip took about an hour and half. We started at 11 a.m. and we enjoyed it a lot. On the boat was plenty of room, we sit wherever we wanted. Nice girls offered us glass of sparkling wine / a good one / and tasty lemonade. Trip was very calm - no waves - so it is ok even for people who do not feel very well on boats. This trip was one of the best moments in our vacation in Budapest.

It is amazing to see Budapest on the Danube , at night !. I made reservations online in 2 minutes, very simple and safe.I chose Legend Cruise Danube, at 21.30 in the night when the sun is down after the Gellert hill. If you have the Budapesta card, you have a 20 % discount of basic price.Route was exactly like the one posted on the official site: from the Margaret Bridge to the Petofi bridge.Therefore you can admire Buda as well Pesta , the historic buildings or new , beautifully lighted .You can listen fascinating commentary plus a film about history of the city, with Audio Guide in 30 languages . You also get a free drink during the ride.Every moment was excellent....Congratulations, highly recommend !

Pedro X - Review. Everything was very well organized and explained.
The service was efficient. The experience was wonderful.
I was on the Fireworks Night Cruise (August 20) therefore it was a 2 in 1 cruise in the Danube River, since it departed on day light, saw the sunset and the fireworks later on.

Day & nite cruise. Did the day cruise with stop at Margaret's Island and two days later the nite cruise. Audio guide has a great story to tell and its fun to listen to The story tellers Buda and Pest! You get to see a stunning view from the boat of almost every sight of Budapest. During nite cruise you get to hear a different kind of story via audio guide, which offers 30 languages. Budapest by nite from a boat is just a must see, to beautiful to describe it. The crew is really nice and offers drinks which are included in the ticket price. You also have the opportunity to get a candle light dinner on board.
Nice River Action. The boat was nice and comfortable. The night views were fantastic. The headset commentary was pretty dull and didn't hold my attention so that's why it's not a 5 rating.
worth trying!. Everything was perfect - ambient, food, wine, music, staff - we loved it! One if the most beautiful impressions of our visit to Budapest!

Night cruising on the Danube in Budapest. We had a rich and tasty dinner on the boat while cruising on the Danube in Budapest and enjoining the panorama of the illuminated city. Thanks a lot for the excellent service.
Wonderful Budapest from Danube river. Great opportunity to see beautiful Budapest from river by night. Unfortunately WiFi didn't work at all.
Sunny trip. Good trip with drinks and good guide. Its very important, that we could choose our language . Thanks.
Sightseeing cruise at night. Very friendly and helpful stuff. Easy booking. Great program. We enjoyed it a lot. It is a must to do program in Budapest.
Nice tour. Very informative and a interesting tour. Includes drinks on board. Special thanks that the information is possible to listen in so many languages-also in estonian. Tanks Buda and Pest :)

Nice experience. Boat ride was very enjoyable. They take you through almost all important places. Commentary is good and informative. We took an evening ride - so we could see the city at Sun set time and once it grew dark, in lights. All in all, a must do in Budapest.
Fabulous vacation. We realy enjoyed our trip in Budapest. Very beautiful city. Boat tour was fantastic. Very hospitible staff. Exellent river tour. We enjoyed up to the maximum

Must do in Budapest. I booked an evening sightseeing cruise online in advance. Highly recommend doing online booking or being early in boat if you want to make sure you´ll get in. Buildings and bridges were beautifully lit up. Drinks were ok, but crew could improve their serving efficiency little bit, e.g. write down drinks per row would make their work much more easier.
Night Cruise. It was a great experience. Great staff, food and wine. Very nice ambience. Live music was also excellent and the lady sand very popular English songs. Worth going again.
Excellent experience. An experience to do while visiting Budapest. Kind staff, interesting information about the city in 30 languages and even a welcome drink!
Very pleasant trip. The boat was confortable, the crew was friendly and the comments in french were clear and very interesting.
Good. We had a good time. The video on the boat was very detailed and explained a lot about Budapest . Would deff go again.
Danube Night Travel. It was an amazing experience travelling on a boat, while spectating the fabulous monuments and beautiful architecture of old Buda.
Nice city. We liked the cruise and the hostesses sere very kind. The optional stop in margit, gave us the chance for a bike tour of the island
fun. it was very very fun, and explanations were great! i am very recommend this with children, the boat was awesome and the stuff was very halpfull
Don't bother!. Shower light didn't work so couldn't shower. Toilet didn't work so couldn't flush. Offered refund which was then denied and never given. Avoid!

It was one of the most perfect nights what I've experienced.. Staff was kind, food was extraordinary, also the beverages. The boat and the whole view is very special. Thank you for everything! I would definitely recommend it to everyone!

Lovely Evening Dinner Cruise. Beautiful cruise with dinner up and down the Danube. Was a great way to see the sights from a different perspective. They sights were lit up and just looked stunning. The food on the cruise was far better than expected. The staff were great and even made up a special vegetarian starter for one of our party. Got a bit chilly, however blankets were provided although eventually the glass wall panels were closed as it was too chilly. Excellent value for money.
Beautiful evening. Together with my husband I spend a beautiful evening on the Danube, admiring the beautiful buildings from Budapest. The cruise was nice.

A well organised and professional operation. This is a well organised and well presented operation, from booking, greeting before the cruise, the cruise itself, the professionalism of the staff and the quality of the vessels. As a result, we had a lovely late-afternoon cruise on the Danube.We booked online (which worked well but could be better optimised for mobile) and arrived at the pier 20 minutes later where they, of course, had our booking. We waited to board in a bright, airy and comfortable lounge.The boat was very clean and obviously well maintained. There was an audio commentary you listen to via headsets available at each seat which was informative and well produced, and also means that you can choose to have a quiet, uninterrupted cruise too if that's your thing.The staff served a choose of champagne, beer, wine, etc on the first part of the one hour cruise. Like many others, we chose to be dropped off at Saint Margaret's island which gave the opportunity to explore there (it's very beautiful), to be picked up by a subsequent cruiser for return to the city - with lemonade served on that last section. The staff throughout were friendly, very pleasant and spoke English, Hungarian, German, French, Italian and Japanese. All in all, a great experience.

Pleasant ride on the Danube. Went on a boat ride on the Danube on our trip in Budapest. We were offered two free drinks. Staff was polite. During the trip was an audio commentary. Saw lovely views of Budapest and took lots of lovely photos. It can feel a bit hot inside the boat until it moves but otherwise a great way of seeing the sights. Budapest was the best of seeing the Danube

nice boat trip. I use this sightseeing tour every time I'm in Budapest, you can listen to your audio guide while drinking champagne or make many pictures of central bridges, royal palace or Parliament. They also have discounted price if you visit them more than once ( you can find the information on your ticket)

Candlelit dinner cruise on the Danube 24Aug16. Excellent service - very friendly and efficient staff with great language skills. Viki looked after us very well. All girls happy to help and to make it a special evening. Very tasty fine food. Lovely warm white blankets for when it got a little chilly. Everything lovely and clean.

Lovely!. Beautiful sightseeing whilst cruising along the Danube. Well organised, friendly staff, and the headphone guide (available in 30 languages!) was very informative. The cruise allows for a stop off at the beautiful Margaret Island, which I'd recommend going to for 2 or 3 hours. The complimentary champagne and lemonade were lovely too!

Spectacular Dinner Cruise. Although it was a stormy, rainy evening we enjoyed the dinner cruise with gourmet quality food very much! Budapest buildings and bridges lit up at night only added to the splendor!
Excellent experience. We did the night cruise on the Danube and it was very beautiful sight. The boat was very comfortable with a complimentary drink. The audio guide was great too.

Evening candlelit dinner cruise. We were given a table right in the middle at the top. The service was great, the food delicious and views were stunning.
My boyfriend proposed as we were passing the beautifully lit up Houses of Parliament and the staff brought out a complimentary glass of champagne to celebrate. All in all a perfect evening!

Evening tour is a must see. One of the highlights of our trip was this short, evening loop around the Danube. Ticket pick-up was quick and efficient. We loaded the boat at dusk and immediately made our way to the open air seating at the back. Shortly, after leaving dock, servers came through for drink orders (one drink is included with your ticket). The journey begins, moving away from the parliament building. The trip was timed perfectly, so that by the time the boat makes its turn, the sky has darkened and the lights of the buildings and bridges start to shine. By the time you reach the pinnacle of the trip, the parliament building shines against the night sky. Highly recommend!
Legenda Boat cruise. Everything was fine. You will also have a cold drink for free !!! You can, if you want leave the boat and stay on Margaret island. On the return journey you will have a lemonade.
River Cruise on the Danube. Amazing trip and the staff were very friendly. Love the hungarian champers :) Would highly recommend this trip and a must to stop off on Margaret Island.
A must for tourists!. Informative, enjoying amazing views on both sides of the Danube river. Free drinks are also offered to you!

Perfect sunset tour.. We took the simple evening tour and it was absolutely perfect. Lovely but non-obtrusive commentary, perfect pace (not too long, not too short) and the staff were really helpful too. It was a perfect way to end our trip to Budapest and I would heartily recommend it.
Fantastic. Fantastic view of Budapest at night with champagne. The parliament was amazing at night with birds flying around it.

Lovely romantic evening. Wonderful food, attentive staff, comfortable boat. The only slight problem was the music - the guitarist was very good but the singer sang flat all evening which was quite painful to listen to. Other than that, top marks for a fantastic cruise.

Budapest Danube cruise. The evening boat cruise was one of the highlights of our visit to Budapest. Seeing all the buildings lit up at night was spectacular. One disappointment was that as we got in front of the parliament, a boat went by obstructing our view and preventing getting an unobstructed photo directly in front. The driver could have just slowed down or stopped to let the boat go by.
Perfect Cruise. Beautiful views and interesting commentary. We appreciated the blankets when the evening got chilly.

Fabulous evening on the Danube. Thoroughly enjoyed the boat trip, excellent attention to detail by the staff. Wonderful views as the sun set, we were treated to glass of champagne as the cruise began, lots of information to help guide us on our tour. Accommodation on board was very comfortable with clear views all around.

Brilliant evening cruise. During our short stay in Budapest we decided to take the Legenda Sightseeing cruise - as recommended by the concierge at our hotel (Boscolo Budapest). We had a brilliant time on a super, air-conditioned, glass-ceiling boat - very comfortable with excellent views along the river.There was an online video and audio commentary throughout the cruise which was an excellent feature of the trip.The girls on the cruise were very helpful as well as being multilingual and served a delicious welcome drink. We came away much more knowledgeable about the history surrounding the Danube in Budapest. We recommend this cruise to anyone visiting Budapest for a few days.
A very nice memory. Budapest is an amazing city and i think the guided cruise stressed very well its beauty. It was the first time I visited it but it certainly will not be the last.Thank you
Beautiful Budapest by boat cruise. nice service, nice ambiance, excellent food! I just have wished to go further on the River rather than to do few times the same itinerary

Suberb!. The trip was amazing, from the beggining to the end. All the staff was very polite and the schedule was fulfilled punctually. The dishes were delicious, the drinks, the music on board and the structure from the ship. I can recommend for all people that are visiting Budapest. Navigate the Danubio river is a single and unforgettable experience.

Dream of the dreams!. Our dinner at Legenda floating on the Danubio River was superb! Unforgettable! The food was splendid, the waitresses impecable, a choice of music absolutely perfect! The magnificent view of the enlightened buildings onde both sides of the river completed the magic of the whole dream! Absolutely wonderful! !

Romantic cruise down the Danube in Budapest. We booked at short notice, and we were pleasantly surprised. staff were polite , efficient , and smartly dressed.the food was above average , served correctly and the wine list adequate and fairly priced.the presentation and surroundings are clean and the crew are able to cope with the cold night air without restricting our photo shots. the music was irritating and the management should look for a new solution as this is NOT what tourists want to listen to! the boat operates a 2 tariff system of HUF 9k boat ride and drink /a la carte or HUF 19k formula (all included) the best choice is the 4 course formula with wine included. as otherwise it works out at the same price!

Fabulous finale to holiday. We took a river cruise on the last night of our holiday. It was fantastic.The food, the service and entertainment were excellent.Then there is the added attraction of the views of beautiful Budapest by night. All illuminated and and looking spectacular.This is a MUST DO trip when you are there
Great spot. Beautiful place for drink or dinner on the river. Great food, great service. Get a table on the balcony and watch the sun set over the castle.

Great afternoon outing, informative and with best views.. Great sightseeing trip down the Danube with complimentary glass of wine, beer or fizz. Commentary in many languages via headphone with easy language selection. Staff professional and friendly, and boats in good order. Informative trip helping you to understand the history of the city of two halves. Beautiful views and great photo opportunities. Think it was around E13 with a small discount for students. We were a bit confused about how to get down to the river side from the walkway at the top, as theres a rail track in between, obvious when you know how, look for the subway style stairs at regular intervals along the pedestrian walkway, and you go down under the track! Oh and you can stop at the Island in the middle and get a later return back, it looks like a holiday island with lots of parks and walks, bike hire etc, I think theres a complex of pools there too, but we didn't as we had a dinner reservation! Looked like it would be fun with younger children.
Excellent. It was amazing!! The food was good, the view was amazing! We love it and will recommend you to our friends
Amazing candlelight dinner. we loved it... amazing cruise.. staff were nice... we even had a champagne as a surprise for our anniversary... worth the money.

perfect to celebrate a special ocassion. We just arrived in Budapest, and I decided to surprise my boyfriend for his bday with a dinner on the Legenda. If was perfect, and we really enjoyed ourselves!
Boattrip. Nice cruise and friendly staff. A really good way to get to see the city from an other perspective and a great opportunity to go for a walk on Margaret Island.

Good to go. Nicely spent time. Budapest was presented from the river what is the must for anyone! The boat was at time, not too crowdy. Cree is amazing; a girl speaking any language you might imagine ( i guess the fixed greetings text only;-) and a boy, child in professional uniform doing adult job of steward having visible fun. Unique!
Excellent Danube cruise. This was one of the highlights of our trip to Budapest. Especially the glass of champagne and the lemonade! The commentary was very interesting too.

nice tour. Nice tour ,well organized with good explanation in many languages. Pleasant cruise personel,
We enyoed very much the tour.
cruise on the Danube. nice, relaxing , a different point of view , you can stop even the island Margherita , sunset over the city and the first light of the icing on the cake evening

Great Experience. This was a great experience. I was there with a group and our tour took about one hour. It was night time and all the lights of the city makes the view magical so i'd recommend doing this at night. There is a headphone for each person and it tells about the architecture of the city, it has many language options so you can probably listen this in your native language. The headphones weren't mobile. This is my only complaint. You can't take them upstairs so feeling the wind and listening about the city is not an option.
Great trip. Nice as there was some drink included, very good boat and guide available in many languages. Also excellent service

Amazing views with great food and service!. The evening was spectacular from start to finish. The food was divine and the staff most attentive. Definitely one of the most enjoyable experiences in Budapest!
Sightseeing. We went on a nightcruise. It was expensive but great. Music and food was good and view was awesome. ,

Awesome at night; stunning lights and views!. We took an 18:30pm time and it worked out perfectly for August. The sun was setting as we left, and down not long after. The boat first went south, then turned and went north, then turned back.There is an audio tour and monitor that tells you about what you are near to. I don't think I looked at the screen once, but did hear the audio as I was snapping photos.Tips:- book early and online. You'll get emailed a PDF for your tickets- if you want to see the lights, get an early evening cruise that coincides with sunset like we did- take a light jacket; it can be windy and cool- arrive early and sit on top. It'll be easier to see both sides, as it's one seat on each side.- fully charge your camera or phone and take plenty of photos- if a day cruise, take sunscreenThe city and some of these buildings pay a decent electric bill given the impressive lights seen at night.They served a beverage to all (this was a non-dinner cruise) consisting of beer, red or white wine, and/or mineral water.I'd definitely do this again when I'm back in the city. It was a blast, and felt pretty short at 1 hour despite the distance covered

Amazing night!. We booked the the exclusive dinner Cruise. At arrival they took us upstairs, which maybe was reserved for the exclusive guests since it was only 5 tables?? The service was great , food even better and the scenery was magnificent! Definetely the highlight off our trip to Budapest. A must I dare say!

Night time cruise. We went on the evening cruise and I would 100% recommend. Not only were the views spectacular the staff were so friendly and the video guide was very intersting and really well done. I will definitely be going again and would recommend it as a must do if in Budapest.

We went for the view, but the meal was world class!. We decided to do a River dinner cruise while in Budapest, and chose Legenda as our provider. We made the decision to go for the full meal deal, as we read some pretty decent reviews about the food.We were not disappointed! Every course was better than the last, and the service was fantastic. Most people spoke English, and between that and our limited hungarian, we were off to the races.Also have to add that we had low expectations regarding the wine - we expected, like all other tours where they have a captive audience, that wine would be expensive, and bad. Well, again, Legenda did not disappoint - a very nice rosee was had for a very decent price.We will do this again, and would highly recommend it.

Budapest seen at night provides amazing views!. Amazing views of Budapest at night - close to an hour boat ride with audio presentation and one free drink. Great service, amazing views and lots of photo opportunities. Wort every penny.

Gorgeous Solo evening trip. I decided to 'spoil' myself by having an evening out on what looked like could be an enjoyable evening. I came aboard, greeted by the staff who were extremely welcoming and checked me in ( I advise pre-booking especially in high season because of the limited spaces and unlike a restaurant you wouldn't get the same movement of bodies being on a boat to free up space!) . Pleasant smiles from all I was shown to a seating area which was comfy and smart.Fairly quickly I was shown to my seat on what looked like a really swish boat. Mirrored ceilings and good decor gave an ambience suited to a relaxed fine dining experience. So far so good. Very quickly I was presented with options for a drink - champagne of course! The menu looked pleasing, I chose a salad to start, soup, steak rare, and a choc cheesecake with fruit sauce. The trip lasted 3 hours which I was surprised at as I thought I may be less. Within the this time we floated up and down the Danube 2.5 times. Budapest I have found to be spectacular, but by night on the river it took my breath away. Each building seems to dress up for the show the parliament building being the most beautiful in my opinion. The Legenda glided up and down smoothly and presented many sightseeing options. I cannot fault the staff, I had a host linked to me and she was excellent. Regularly checked up on me, swiftly took my orders and cleaned up each course. Was watchful for when I needed a refill or something else. Service because you were on a boat and I am guessing meals cooked in segments ( start, main etc) were at times a little slow but the view was distracting. Other than this very small point, I was massively impressed. I was even offered a blanket as I got a little cold! I went for the full package which included drink as starter, trip and 4 courses. This cost 18600 ft. I felt this was worth the cost ten fold.food was excellent well cooked and presented, the venue, experience and service just brill. Highly recommend for a special trip solo, with friends or romantic couples.

Informative, flexible and friendly. Several daytime cruises leave dock 7 at 90minute intervals. With commentary on sights passed for both Buda and Pest, the boat first heads down stream then turns to go upstream until the delightful Margaret Island where there is the option (except for the final non-dining departure) to jump off and explore the island for 90 minutes before resuming the second leg of the tour on the next boat's arrival.The first leg takes around 45 minutes, the return, without commentary, takes just 20 mins back to the centre. A drink is offered on the outward leg (choice of beer, wine, OJ) and lemonade is offered on the return. All the young staff are friendly and polite (and multilingual). Very reasonably priced half day out. The Budapest Card get a 20% discount.

The best boat trip in Budapest. This was our second time on the Legenda Sightseeing Boats (the other one being a few years ago now) and it was fantastic yet again. The staff are lovely and speak excellent English. The boat is lovely and clean. The price is very competitive and in my view these boats look the nicest, most modern from what there is on offer, which is why we chose to go with them for the second time. We were not disappointed. The little waiting area before you board is great - nice comfy sofas with free wifi. The wifi on board did not work for me but then again who wants to be surfing the net when there are such beautiful views to be seen! During the trip we got two drinks, one was a choice of wine, beer, soft drink, champagne and on the return leg you get a Legenda lemonade. The toilet facility was nice and clean and so was all the rest of the boat. You have commentary from individual headsets attached to your seats and can choose from a number of languages. It is a good commentary - perhaps a little less than what I would expect if I compare them to say trips in London but nonetheless informative and definitely not too short. I just love finding out all there is about everything so maybe a bit more would have been better.I would whole heartedly recommend this trip (which lasts an hour) and would go as far as saying it is a must for anyone visiting Budapest. The boat was covered with open sides so would also be fine on a wet day.

Dinner Cruise on the Danube. The dinner cruise on the Danube was a great experience. We were seated on the upper level and had a great view of everything as we sailed by. The food was very delicious and the entertainment was quite enjoyable.

magical dinner cruise. We spent six nights in Budapest and decided on the dinner cruise for our 20th anniversary dinner. It could not have been more magical. 2.5 hours on the boat in the evening meant we got to watch the sunset and all the lights coming on at Parliament and the bridges. It had been a very hot day, but the evening was pleasant with breezes. There were plenty of photo opportunities. The music was American jazz and the musicians were very good though I might have preferred Hungarian music, but at least it was not too loud and pleasant. The food was surprisingly delicious and I am a foodie! We went with the preset pricing option and were very glad we did that instead of ala carte. So glad we chose to do this!
Perfect, nice experience. Very clean boat. The attention was very well, we seated on the top of the boat for a perfect views of Budapest. A nice trip. I will choose it another time!
Amazing Experience. Very good sightseeing experience of night tour during on board, fantastic shore scenery of Danue River, good tast of dinner food, excellent service.
Bucket List check off! 😍. This was truly a wonderful experience to have a delicious meal and on the Blue Danube! Before this; I had only read about it in history class!Daphne C. Alford USA

overall a nice experience. It was a nice tour and the seats were ok. the audioguide was complete, available in many languages and especially original, being told as if it was narrated by the Danube. it was good. not perfect but good.
A beautiful trip on the trip on the Danube. It was overal a marvellous expererience. Everything was fine from our places on the boat to the excellent dinner
Excellent experience. Excellent service and comfort, audio/video guide in several languages is very interesting and sound/ image of very good quality!

The Best Way to see Budapest by Night. Great boat tour with a really informative and interesting guide. Very comfortable too.Really is the best way to see Budapest and how beautiful a city it really is.
Excellent attraction. Friendly staff; comfortable seats; informative audio guide; clean and new boat, which is nicely equipped
Fabulous view and drink. Adequate duration and detail city guide with breathtaking night view. We love it very much. The drink is also good, recommended.

This is a must do tour. We booked online and only had to show the booking number on my phone, no need to print anything. Only had to queue for a short time, well organised staff had everyone on the boat in quick time. Comfortable seats, head phones worked well, lots of languages available.It was quite magical sitting in an open sided boat on a summers evening watching the amazing city of Budapest and the Danube river all lit up. We were given a glass of champagne each ( there were other choices too) to enjoy as we went along. Ours was a bit slow arriving but the staff were working hard, it was just that our seats were the last to be served...just the luck of where we chose to sit.Highly recommend this trip

Don't leave Budapest without taking the night tour!. I'm not into touristy attractions so I was a little apprehensive about taking this bout tour.In mid July, the sun goes down in Budapest around 9pm. I paid for the trip ahead of time at our hotel so we walked easily on board as the sun was setting on the city.It's cute as the stewardesses deliver intros in several different languages. The top level was quickly filled and we grabbed seats below either side is fine as the boat circles the the river, but I would seat to the right side.The audio head sets work just fine and the video they play on board is spoken from the personified voice of the Danube river providing the history of the city. I was awed by the views right from the get go, but be prepared to be wowed by the night time view of the parliament building. I would recommend the night tour by far. The historic buildings lit up at night are majestic. Oh and you get one free beverage. The beer was good too.

Recommended . We booked the cruise to Margaret island and after a few minutes struggling to find the correct dock, when we did find it we were welcomed by lovely staff who were incredibly and very impressively multilingual. We were offered a soft drink on the cruise over and a lemonade on the cruise back. During the trip they offered a good audio guide of all the major sights along the danube. Highly recommended!
Visitin Budapest by boat. Just perfect, good view on top of the boat, you get several drinks for free while enjoying beautiful Budapest. And this at a reasonable price

Dinner cruise on the Danube. Lovely cruise. A great way to see Budapest at night. Service was excellent. The food was good, well cooked. We were on an upper deck. The live music was below. They were very good too.

Outstanding!. This cruise is really romantic, the food is excellent, the service is superb. Budapest at night is simply lovely. I recommend you take the night candle cruise with the meal included, it is worth it.

Too much video, too few explanations. The cruise itself was very relaxing, the staff friendly & the complimentary drink welcome. There were problems with the video guide itself, however. Often the buildings being described were on the far shore & there was an excessive amount of first person narrative meaning we had cruised way past the point in question & omitted other potentially interesting historic sites.

A VERY NICE EVENING SAILING DANUBIO RIVER. It was a memorable evening, sharing with my wife, having dinner and enjoying beautifull sightseen. Ir was our first time in Budapest and this "short" cruise made us very happy.

Best night of my life !. Booked the exclusive dinner cruise with my girlfriend. Weather was perfect, food was amazing. We left at 19:45, it was very warm outside, soon the sun started to set, the main buildings started to light up. The music, food, atmosphere and weather all clicked to this perfect evening.

A super way to end a visit to Budapest!. Had a wonderful meal with very attentive and friendly crew. We opted for the Dinner cruise with menu included- fantastic value for a beautifully cooked 4 course meal. The views were spectacular and the live music just completed the feel of the cruise. A really excellent evening- would thoroughly recommend for the end of a visit to the city. We were a couple but there were clearly families and friends enjoying a similar top quality evening. Thanks to all the crew for a lovely end to our holiday.
Magical ride. Nighttime cruise on the Danube was a highlight of my trip. We had headphones to hear about what we saw, in our own language. The beautiful buildings and bridges were spectacular.

An experience to remember. Nice food and lovely trip around the River Densu. Sit on the top deck it's lovely. We went for the paid meal and all we had to do was pay for drinks. Staff are lovely. Try the ice tea!

Legenda boat trip Budapest. I really enjoyed this boat trip - the commentary was great as there was a different voice for each side of the river, for Buda and for Pest and the level of information was just right for me. The trip enabled us to see many of the main sites and orientate ourselves. We also spent an hour and a half cycling around Margaret Island before the boat picked us up again - which was an added bonus. The boat was comfortable and we received two complementary drinks whilst on board. I would definitely recommentd this.

Highly recommended Evening cruise on the Danube by Legenda. During a trip to Budapest we made a very enjoyable evening cruise on the Danube.The Cruise lasts about an hour, we cruise near the main sites in Budapest They are seen with night illumination, Amazingly beautiful sight seeing.When passing by each site טםו get an explanation in several languages.

Excellent food and nice cruise. I got the exclusive dinner cruise with four course menu and was not disappointed. Food was excellent, wine was good (though selection was not that big) and the cruise offered a nice view of the Budapest banks. I had a table on the upper deck, which was better than the ones below.

Brilliant evening. I booked the exclusive 4 course dinner cruise online as part of my wife's birthday trip to Budapest and it was absolutely great! From the welcome on arrival to the friendliness and courtesy of the staff and crew I thoroughly recommend the cruise with Legenda to anyone who wants to see the beauty of Budapest at night. The food and wine were excellent, and beautifully presented. The service was swift and efficient, and the staff were a pleasure to deal with. We look forward to next time!

Great value for money. Lovely little trip up and down the river, with a bit of history thrown in. Two complimentary drinks is great, only improvement would be forward-facing outdoor seating. Apart from that great!

Decent boat tour. This tour was recommended by the concierge at the hotel. I think it was everything you could expect from a Danube river cruise. A cheesy tape recorded history lesson with a bad drink included. However, seeing the sun set and the lights from Budapest were amazing. If you like cheesy tours, then you'll love this.

Wonderful dinner cruise . A great night out on the Danube with Legenda Cruises. The welcome on board was warm and genuine. The service was excellent. The standard of the food was amazing 4 courses, complimentary drink on board and excellent selection of wines. The staff were multi lingual and welcomed everyone. The entertainment was unobtrusive and perfect for the setting. If you enjoy fine dining, good wine and beautiful location you can't go wrong on this trip.

Nice trip. It was nice to see Budapest from the river. Good comments in many languages, start and finish on time.
One comment: went near the "shoe monument" without pointing it out

Brilliant, again!. This is the third time for myself to go on this sightseeing cruse and again, it was brilliant!! Thoroughly enjoyed myself, very informative and beautiful views, will probably do again!

Great trip, good food .... We were greeted and boarded to the top deck. Seated and brought our complimentary champagne. Menu was fantastic and food terrific. Service was good but food came late as hour 2 hr boat ride turned into 3. Sights were spectacular.

Good services. We took a ride with this boat on July, when we visited Budapest for a couple of days. We really enjoyed it, they gave us some drinks (included in the price), the stuff is very friendly. It was a real pleasure and I recommend taking Legenda Sightseeing boats.

Gentle ride, clear info, free drinks! . Did a day tour (3.30pm) after our feet had started to mutiny after waking since 9am. Was impressed with the free drinks on offer (many people had champagne!). Audio guide was clear and easy to understand. Customer service was good. View was excellent. Great idea to give time on Margaret island with discounts. Much appreciated. Lovely extras I haven't had on any other river cruise (London, Amsterdam, Bangkok etc). Would have liked more information on the audio guide but what was on offer was sufficient.
grate. it was very nice and an exalent idea to do this the personal was very nice and profesionali'm sure i'll recomand it to friendsron

Beautiful sightseeing boat trip. Excellent tour, very informative commentary along the way, beautiful sights to see. Really enjoyable evening. Free drink was much needed - as it was a very warm evening. Staff were very polite and attentive. Would certainly recommend this, one of the highlights of our trip!

Absolutely worth it!. I recently went on this tour with my family and was blown away by how great it was! Although I am sure the day tour is awesome as well, I definitely recommend doing it at night; everything looked stunningly beautiful!The staff was very friendly and professional. Instructions were given in many languages, not just English, which was probably very helpful to a lot of the passengers.The ticket price includes a drink. I had an excellent glass of champagne, which combined with the breathtaking views from the boat made for an unforgettable memory.Also included in your ticket is an audioguide. I thought the tour had the perfect amount of information; not so much as to be overwhelming, but enought to keep you interested and make you feel like you learned something. It is also narrated by the Danube, which I thought was a neat idea that made it different from other audiotours.Whether you are in Budapest for a day or a week, this is a quick yet beautiful and efficient way to see the main sights in Budapest and I highly recommend it!
Just excellent. Food was excellent, and the trip is enough long to have a good dinner!! I strongly recommend it!!!!!
