EXCELLENT EXPERIENCE. Everything was perfect: the food, the service, the music and the wheather. It is a very exciting experience to have the opportunity to see Budapest by night on a boat. I recommend it. Even if it is not cheap, it is worth the money!

a wonderful, relaxing and tasty experience. We went on this luxury dinner night cruise on occasion of our 40th marriage anniversary. The extremely friendly way we were served at our table on top of the boat was remarkable and the 4 course dinner ( we had a choice of different meals per course) absolutely delicious and a pleasure for our eyes, too. We can advise anybody who is looking for a special dinner boat trip to choose this legenda sightseeing co. ! Thanks deeply to everybody who cared for us on our special evening (3rd of june 2016)!
Wow!😂. It was a great trip. The view on both Budha and Push was superb in the night the view of lights on all building s and bridges was beautiful. The information on the audio very informative

Danube cruise is a must in Budapest. We took the daytime sightseeing cruise and spent some time on Margaret Island with our kids. They loved the special 4-wheel bikes offered right at Legenda's island-pier. Nice boat, excellent staff, great experience. Highly recommended.

Legends not so legendary.. The tour was OK. But, that's about it. The boat was full of grade school kids who were yelling and screaming and generally disruptive. The AC on the boat was not functional and the staff was efficient but not really friendly. The most amazing part of the tour was the hostess who gave instructions in five or six languages and the boat pilot who maneuvered the boat like a e in very high current water.

Great tour: odd electronics.. This tour was great. Budapest is spectacular at Sunset and this tour showed us everything. The only drawback was that our audio guy kept switching from English to Estonia. Estonian is an interesting language.

This River Cruise is great!. When you are on your own and wanted to do a danube river cruise, then this is recommended. Take the 5pm cruise as the boat is usually not filled and you have lots of space to move around. The recording is very informative and covers all languages on eath. Highly recommended.
Amazing!. 1h trip was amazing! A glass of wine, splendid views, big TV screens and interesting materials to listen...Budapest is great!

Amazing cruise to view night Budapest. Great city. Amazing boat experience. Friendly staff. A bit disorganised at the entrance. People were not queueing, but pushed ahead. Would be helpful if a member of a staff would coordinate the crowd.

Glad we didn't take dinner cruise. I read the reviews comparing the day versus night cruises. I'm so glad we went in the day. We seemed to have a longer route. It was summer and not dark during the dinner cruise so no lights on the buildings. We didn't have pushy waiters or musicians or waiters. It wasn't crowded, and we got the two drinks as promised. The best part was biking on Margaret. This was the most fun!
very good. wunderfull, good service, great view. the food is not the best but tatsy. music is nice and drinks fine

Business adventure. Staff were very friendly. English skills of the staff are impeccable. The service was fantastic for our large group. The selection of dinner items was good. I chose the steak which was well prepared but coming from Chicago there is better steak in the world :). We had a great light show with a nearby thunderstorm and the sky was magnificent along with the incredible architecture that Budapest certainly has a lot to boast about. Overall, this was a great business adventure with my colleagues.
Good experience with reasonable price. The boat was clean, food was good, staff were friendly and night view was fantastic . Will recommend to friends.

Dinner cruise. Great food great service lovely views. For a special evening out that guarantees something special. There is a lot of competition along the Danube and this is not the cheapest but we thought it was good value for money.
Don't miss this in Budapest. We enjoyed our 1 hour night cruise of the Danube so much, we went back again 2 nights later. Simply stunning!
Dinner and Site seeing trip. Beautiful boat with great views of the City. Wonderful food splendidly served, a great evenings entertainment for 6 old friends. Very good value. Can highly recommend.
Perfect experience. The guide girls are fantastic and super nice. They can speak several languages and really helpful. I really had a nice time.
Dinner date. Great food and atmosphere. Had the dinner brought as a present by my sister in law for my wedding present

Budapest first time. Very smiling and helpful crew. The boat was clean and nice. I also enjoy that they had automatic guide in sooo many langues, even Norwegian. I dont know anything ! about the price level, we bought a 4 hour driving around togheter with this boat trip. All in all, i can recomend this boat trip.

An excellent trip. We went on this trip with our 2 sons aged 10 and 7. It was very good value for money, the staff were very welcoming and helpful and the commentary very informative. We stopped off at Margaret Island, which was lovely and the boat back was tight on time. It was very relaxing and the children loved it too. The lemonade drink was delicious and very welcome in the heat. We would definitely recommend this trip.

Great attraction. I had a great time being on one of these boats. They showed us around patiently and served us good drinks. U can't afford to miss the Danube river cruise when you visit Budapest. I would recommend legenda boats to anyone as they even provide restrooms and wifi on their boats. Completely satisfied. Thank you.
Wonderful evening. The boat was lovely, the scenery classically beautiful and the service excellent. The food was surprisingly good and the guitarist and singer and excellent. A superb evening.
Nice. 3 hours river cruise with free champagne, very nice quality!Buy the tickets online beforehand would be better for dawn time cruise.

Excellent. My kids were 6 and 8 yo. We loved the boat sightseeing. We had the presentation in our native language, so even the kids could understood everything. We liked getting the drink on board too. Easy on line tickets.
Legenda Sightseeing Budapest. The best Sightseeing cruise I have done.All was perfect. the food, the waitresses, the singer. It was a great experience.I recomend it to do it.
very good. This city sightseeing is marvellous. We were very glad to be there. The quality of the drink was good.

Great introduction to Budapest. The 1-hour Danube cruise starting at 8:15 pm was great. I liked this as an introduction to Budapest, which none of our group had ever visited. The best part was the video and audio (in numerous languages that you could select) that gave very interesting information about each sight, at approximately the time we passed it.. Naturally, the lighted-up buildings were beautiful at night. The cruise staff members were pleasant and helpful. One woman had made a reservation online but hadn't received a confirmation, and this was not a problem. I highly recommend this cruise company.
beautiful. Very nice boattrip. Beautiful vieuw on the Castle, The Govermentbuilding and the bridges. And a free drink for everyone on board.

Relaxing way to spend an hour. This is a lovely boat trip & very informative. We were able to see more sights in an hour that we could've accomplished on foot & the headphones provided a really interesting commentary about the landmarks & history of Budapest. A complimentary drink was provided on the outward journey (including the option of champagne) & lemonade on the return. The boat docks briefly at Margaret island & you can disembark if you wish & stay for half an hour, catching the next boat back.

No translation. The drink service was fine and being on the water and seeing the sights was very nice, but the translation through the headphones did not work. If you don't care about the informational program then it's a nice evening trip.
Excellent. Lovely boat trip, excellent service and food. Would recommend to friends and family, and go on boat again on my next visit

Excellent boat trip. Lovely boat trip, food was tasty and good value. the buildings along the Danube all lit up lovely to see at night. Couldn't really hear the singers as we were at the other end of boat

great and nice boat tour. Good welcome, a lot of interesting information (Video in several languages) and a nice boat tour. The information given was more then enough. We will come again to Budapest and look some places, described in the video. Thank you!
Very nice trip and I enjoyed mijzelf. I have a great time and enjoyed mijzelf. Thank you for the very nice boottrip. The day was perfect!!

Fantastic. It great. Wonderful but better if Car sent from hotel to dock 7
Nice. And. Overview it good. And. Have. Thai langue.

cruise. Actually, we intended to order sightseeing + dinner. WHatever the reasom might be, we got a cruise only.
The windows were reflecting the outside lights, which decreased our joy.
Romantic evening on the Danube. My husband and I enjoyed a gorgeous evening viewing the sights along the Danube. Shrimp salad was delicious as was the fruit soup appetizer.

Superp!!. Went on the Dinner Cruise i may.
Really nice boat, really nice food and service. Would do it again :-)
Great experience. Great experience, and the son was also thrilled and he is 8 years old. Friendly staff, great atmosphere. Wish you all best! :)

Well run and worth the time. There are literally dozens of river tour boats chugging up and down the Danube between Buda and Pest. The Legenda stands out as the premier for several reasons. First, there is ample courteous staff everywhere. Second, there are plenty of good seats ( I recommend getting there early and trying to nab one of the upper deck outdoor seats). The voice over system supports 30+ languages and while a bit exaggerated, it is informative and interesting. Watching the staff climb the stairs with 20+ drinks on a serving tray was worth the price all by itself. Lastly, do the nighttime tour. The city by the river at night is breathtaking and the view from the river will stay with you for a long time.

Danube at night is a mighty sight. Absolutely gorgeous views of the buildings on the banks of the Danube, all lit up and glowing in the night! Heat inside lounge area terribly extreme and we weren't told we could go up to the deck. As no one else did, we waited half the cruise, then went up into the freezing night air, magical, and got the most beautiful photos. Value for money trip

Great river cruise with great food ! . Really enjoyed the cruise. Got to see many of the sites several times in different evening light. Not too crowded , service was excellent. Did the a la crate dinner option , worked out fine. Highly recommend. Booked online , contacted them with a question. Fast , courteous response.

Fantastic trip.. This was the perfect end to our first day of our first trip to Budapest. Legenda was a great experience, the staff were wonderful, the food was delicious and the entertainment was just right for the occasion. I can't speak highly enough of the whole evening - GREAT JOB!

Delightful anniversary dinner. The views were spectacular, the food was very good (surprisingly), and the staff was very attentive. Soft music was provided by a guitarist and a talented singer. It wasn't cheap, but worth every Forint.
Great Trip!!. Excellent service!! Thanks so much!! it was an amazing way to discover the other side of Budapest: from Danube river

Legenda Dinner Cruise. Great night. . Wonderful cruise to see the danube, the monuments and bridges of Budapest. It is something else to see them lighted in the night-time. As for the dinner, prices are high but overall the dinner is good (I would only recommend not to take a starter as they are small portions, especially the scallops). The staff was pro, friendly and the live music was perfect, not loud.An experience worth the price.

Very good food, great views. great music. We had a very nice dinner with wine while cruising the Danube. Seeing the major buildings at dusk and then again lit up after dark was a treat. Food was surprisingly good and the young guitarist and singer were very good indeed. We had a wonderful evening. The only hiccup was that the wine bottle we opened was opened prior to delivering it to the table.
Perfect. If there's one thing not to be missed in Budapest, it is the river cruise. It's a very pleasant and enjoyable experience.

candlelit dinner cruise. Highly recommend this trip. Partner booked it as a surprise and it was superb. Great service, great food and cruising st night seeing budapest is so beautiful. Also a band playing in the background. I will always remember that night in particular. Well worth it!
Morning on the most beautiful rever. A morning out with family was great fun on this river cruise. Everybody was very helpful and the free drink a bonus on top of the beautiful sights.
From Turkey. We visited 1 day ago. It was so awesome but some part of trip not so good and finally thank you for all think

Candle lit Dinner Cruise. Although the candle was actually an LED (presumably for Health & Safety reasons) the whole event was very well done. Food and service was excellent. Greeted with a complementary drink they placed us at a window seat as requested. As it was our Wedding anniversary they also gave us a celebratory glass of Champagne during the cruise. Cannot fault anything.
Good food, good service and perfect setting.. Totally worth the price. The food was good, but could be better. The views from the Danube and the ambiance are umforgettable.
Sunset boat ride. A great boat ride.. Taking the cruise after sunset is magical when all the buildings and bridges are lit up

Once in a lifetime experience. I was in Budapest mid May 2016 and I was on the Legenda cruise on the Danube river in the evening. It was such a breathtaking view. There was a rainbow sighted in the horizon and the ride was so comforting. The cruise staff was so warm and welcoming. The history that was spoken about the city and its rich architecture on the headphones was so educative. The ride, smooth and entertaining, a super relaxing experience. A must do while in Budapest.
Best night boat to see Budapest!. Great service and an outstanding view of Budapeste! I definetely recommend this boat trip! My mom also loved it!
Beautiful Danubio Blue. We had a great times in Legenda, excellent staff and incredible view from the boat made the trip the best time of the week end spent in Budapest !!!!

Great sight-seeing cruise. The evening sight-seeing cruise is really amazing. You have to sit on the left side, because the headphones-guide is describing the buildings on your left side. The time flied really fast on the boat and it was spectacular.
very nice experience!!!. Cool boat. Nice view. 30 languages !!! The best.i have nothing else to say... If you want river tour this is the best choice

Incredible dinner cruise on theDanube. On our last night in Budapest, we took the dinner cruise with Legenda. What an awesome experience. The food alone is worth the price. Add in the beautiful city of Budapest at night, and you have the best evening experience you could imagine.
Fabulous. Treat for 27th wedding anniversary. Great food, great service. Terrific experience. We're told best available and definitely agree!

A magic view of Budapest by night!. What an experience! Seeing Budapest by night ... dazzling, fresh, and irresistible! Very courteous and professional service on board. Comfortable, safe and VERY well commented.
Great dinner cruise. We loved this dinner cruise. Great food, great service and a nice evening view. The tcruise was easy to order on the internet. We will gladely be back.

Great Danube Cruise. The place, the service and the food was perfect. We had a perfect quiet and enjoyable evening.The scenery was great and we have taken great pictures.Our two teens were impressed by the boat, the scenery and delighted by the free internet. I did directly booked a second evening on the Legenda boat as we had returned to the hotel. I can only recommend to have a nice relaxing evening with teen.

Amazing. It was amazing. I ,my boyfriend and our dog Marley enjoyed the trip very much!
The audio guides were really interesting and it was very nice from you to give us a welcoming drink and the staff also gave water to my dog.
We recommend Legenda to everyone!

Evening sightseeing cruise. My brother and I (early 20s) were looking for a night cruise but didn't want a sit down dinner. We ultimately chose a legenda cruise at 8pm. Perfect time to begin the cruise. It lasted an hour (great length of time) and included a complimentary drink. Sit upstairs!!! You'll get better photos. Would recommend this cruise for those looking for a less stuffy atmosphere. The price is right, too!

Lovely Night Cruise. City was illuminated with a spectacular sparkle. We enjoyed the romantic ride with drinks included. Even thought time went quickly we were able to have our 2 drinks. We got some great pictures for our scrapbook.

An amazing evening.. My wife and I really enjoyed our evening dinner cruise. The food was excellent and staff was friendly and helpful. The views while on the evening cruise is magnificent. Many great picture taking opportunities, the city looks sensational at night.

Date night . So I picked the 4 course candlelight dinner , and it was fab I booked online and it was roughly £100 for two which included a welcome drink and 4 courses . When we arrived at roughly 10Mins before we where due to depart, we where swiftly shown to our table on the top deck , given our complimentary drink of champagne, although you can choose , and the table, complete with blankets just in case you get cold when the sun goes down , which I thought was a nice touch I've got to say the steak was to die for and the service and scenery was great . The wine list was very reasonable and we had a bottle of Merlot for £10 . Go ahead treat yourself !
Very informative. Nice sightseeing with a good audio guide. Not too much but enough to have an idea of the History og Buda and Pest.Free limonade and a glas of beer!

Great trip. I've been to Budapest many times, always great to visit again, and i have to say the boat trip is a must, only Legenda has a luxury boat, the guide in my language, witch is not very popular, also has free drinks included. Highly recommend.
Amazing time. This was a great experience with my girlfriend. Highly recommended. Food, atmosphere and waiters were amazing.
Brilliant. I loved the naval sightseeing of Budapest. The information was accurate and thorough and the drinks were more than satisfying. LOVED the beer.

Wonderful evening Dinner cruise on Danube wih Legenda 10/10. Booked on line. Cool evening so glad boat is glass panelled with sliding doors.which kept a very comfortable temp. Boat left at 20:45 and back around 10:30. Views are stunning but what made trip was quality of food, excellence of service, lovely chilled champagne on arrival . Totally smooth ride and all topped with laid back guitarist/singer. Great atmosphere - cant rate highly enough. Probably highlight of our trip to Budapest.
great view of Budapest. great view of Budapest. The boat was nice, deppart on time. The explanations were good. Alcoholic drinks served were not very good. But staff was really nice and helpful

Lovely dinner aboard the Legenda. The service on board, live music and food were good and exceeded our expectations. We really enjoyed the experienced and contemplated the beauty of Budapest while navigating the Danube river.

Lovely evening. Spent a wonderful evening cruising the danube, the meal was delightful, staff friendly and helpful. The boat is just perfect for viewing the sights of beautiful Budapest. Highly recommend this trip.

great trip. plenty of room, comfortable seats, good views through the surround glass, free drink and a good commentary. We chose to get off at the island, had a bike ride and picked up the boat 90 mins later. would definitely recommend.

Excellent choice!. Our Legenda cruise was one of the highlights of our trip to Budapest. We chose the 4-course dinner cruise and were not disappointed. The setting is wonderful -- the interior of the boat is pleasant and spacious; you're not seated cheek to jowl with other guests like on some dinner cruises. Whether you're on a romantic outing or sightseeing with friends, the ambience and service were just right. The boat's full windows make sure every sight is within view as you float along the Danube. And the food is excellent! It's not exaggerating to say it was the best meal we had in Budapest. Highly recommend!
It was great!!. Good food, good service, great view. We had a great time. 2.5 hours well speaned. The bout is closed.
Amazing. This has been one of my best travel experiences. You can enjoy the views of the amazing architectures of Budapest while the sun sets. Totally recommend it.
Great! Excellent!!. Superb river cruise. Reasonable price. Comes with drinks. An hour river cruise. Fascinating view. Loving it!!!!

Great service and beutifull wievs!. Very nice personal, conviniet location and breathtaking wievs of night Budapest going along with informative commentaries of audiguide possible on huge variety of languages

Legenda Dinner Cruise = Great time. We wanted to see Budapest by night and saw numerous options for river cruises along the Danube. We turned to trip advisor for guidance and the ratings for the Legenda dinner cruise are well deserved. Don't be swayed when you walk up and see a small boat amongst giants, stay the course. I suggest taking the evening cruise, approx. 7:45 p.m departure when we went. It gave a nice glimpse of the sunset and great views of a lit up Budapest at night. The food was fantastic, although some may argue a tad pricey but great things come with a cost. The dinner cruise offers a four course meal (app, soup, main,dessert) in a classy little boat with a full glass exterior to afford riders superb views and photo opportunities of the city regardless of seating position. The appetizers were certainly light for a big eater such as myself, but don't fret, glory lies ahead. We had the shrimp and scallops both of which were delicious apps. Then the soup came, given that we can't eat pork, and the marrow used was that of a pig, we ordered the citrus cream soup, which seemed more like a light dessert but was also delicious. Then at last the main course, they gave pretty generous portions on all of the mains at our table, we ordered the duck, trout, steak and risotto as a side. All were great, but the duck reigned supreme in my eyes. Desserts were all solid. There was live music as well, the guitarist played like a champ. The only possible complaint I could have for this cruise is that for those who sit at the tables in the very front near the musicians, the music got a tad loud from time to time making it a little hard to converse. But honestly the guitarist was so damn good I didn't care. Fantastic evening, do the cruise.

Quite relaxing. We had prebooked this trip and were a little concerned what it would be like as it was quite cold and windy during our visit... however, we needn't have worried as the boat was actually covered over and quite warm inside. The audio was a little on the cheesy side, but it was quite relaxing to be driven up and down the river and we enjoyed the drinks that were included :-)

Pleasant trip. The weather wasn't at its best so that might have put other people off from joining us so the boat wasn't too full. It was good that the deck was covered to keep out the wind, but when the sun came out it got very warm. The inclusive drinks were very welcome, and we learned quite a lot about Buda and Pest on our trip.
One lovely evening. We were 6 lades, having a wonderfull evening on the boat. Excellent dinner! We will recomend this boattripp to our friends and would love to come back another time.
Budapest Recce. An enjoyable hour with colleagues spent cruising on the Danube as the city of Budapest 'lit up'! We particularly enjoyed the free drink on board!

Lovely opportunity to see Budapest lit up at night coupled with fine dining and great service.. This is the second occasion that I have had the opportunity to take this dinner cruise in the last couple of years . Because of the weather this was the better trip of the two. Having said that the food was equally as good on both trips. The staff were really pleasant and very attentive. It is well worth the money and I would certainly do it again.
Excellent trip. Very good food and super friendly staff. Nothing to complain at all. The trip is really worth the money. Our recommendarion is to book the night cruise - just spectacular!

Beautiful Tour. What a wonderful way to see Budapest. Make sure you book the night tour. The city comes alive at night. It's a 1 hour tour and the accompanying video and audio are quite informative. Offering a glass of champagne, wine or beer was a nice touch as well.

Evening boat cruise with Leganda glass boat. Great boat trip on Donau! Its a glass boat so you will se very well all the attractions beside the river. When it gets dark the buildings and bridges turnes on the light- very beatiful. Had the 4 courses dinner . A glass of champagne first, starters, soup, main course and dessert. This is included in the ticket. Vine and more drinks is extra. Its live music, relaxing setting after a long sightseeing day and the people working at the boat is nice, fast and has good suggestions of vine with the food. The food was of a high restaurant quality. They play live music all along the trip. Had a table at the window with the best view. A little more expencive than some other trips but probably worth it when on holidayBook the tour on the webside before arriving , its popular!
Prima Service - Prima food. It was a fantastic trip - A first class service from the you personal - and very good food. - We can give this trip our very best recommandations!

Romantic Dinner. The candlelight dinner was the best way to end our wonderful holiday in Budapest. In my opinion this boat is very pretty and the most suitable to enjoy the Danube and its beautiful shores illuminated. With the Exclusive package we received a welcome cocktail and we could choose one dish for each course (4). I am very satisfied by the third course, I chose the duck breast with rosemary in cherry sauce, delicious. The musical accompaniment was very enjoyable. Romantic atmosphere and stunning views. I highly recommend it.
Good value. friendly staff, multiple languages audio guide, smooth and cozy trip with fine drinks, couldn't ask for more. :)
Excellent evening. We had a wonderful evening! We enjoyed the trip very much. The Food was awesome! Viki ist the best!!

Great view of the city. I took one of the nighttime cruises, which came with a free drink. I got a champagne, which was reasonable in flavor. Each seat also had an audio tour in many different languages, and although it was a bit confusing to figure out where exactly it was referring to, the accompanying video was helpful.There was some glare involved when taking pictures since I wanted to avoid the chilly winds, but the view was breathtaking. Overall, this was an excellent and affordable way to rest my feet and take in the nighttime scenery on a relaxing boat ride.

Fabulous night time boat ride. We had a fabulous night time ride on this boat. The boat is designed to really maximize your view - the windows go from floor to ceiling, and even extend to over your heads. It seemed to be much better than the other boats we saw on the water that had smaller windows. The audio tour (thru headsets) comes in an amazing amount of languages, and tells you interesting things about the sites you see as well as some history of Budapest and Hungary. Interesting and entertaining. Loved it. Highly recommend this particular boat for a sightseeing trip on the Danube,
Fantastic. Good dinner. Spectacular views. Kindly atmosphere. Excellent service and music. A good surprise.....
wonderful evening in Budapest. Everything perfect, the ship, the food, the service and the atmosphere. Beatiful and romantic evening on the Danubio. Absolutely suggested.
Budapest from his best side. Budapest is the pearl of Danube. so pleas see it from there. Especially during sun set it is beautiful, all the lights and the buildings.
Dinner Cruise. Nice experience on the river with beautiful views and good food. Service on the boat was also excellent.

Highlight of our Budapest trip. Great atmosphere, great service, live band, food and cruise! I would do it again in a heart beat! Our little 2 year old also enjoyed it and was welcomed aboard no problem?
sweet break of peace and relaxation. an hour of a different point of view. recommended.bring a camera. stay a few hours on Margit island and go back to to city on the next boat.
Great view, fantastic staff. I organized a dinner for an engagement to a couple from Cyprus. Great view, best staff, it became their dream

A must do in Budapest. I am not a huge fan of boats but this river cruise is a delight. The boat is clean, comfortable and spacious. Commentary is excellent and very interesting in a multi choice of languages. The crew serve complimentary drinks as you cruise up the Danube. An optional stop at Margit Island gives you the chance to explore this beautiful island and then you can re join the boat 1.5 hours later or walk the length of the island (2.5km) and then cross the bridge back into the city.
Unsatisfied !!!. We was on a Day-Tour and it was a bad experience. Unfriendly Personal and the "Free W-Lan" was not working. For this Price you can have much better Boat Tours.

Boat trip better than expected !. I am not big on boat trips but tried this cruise anyway because I wanted to see Budapest lit up at night. The trip and food was way beyond my expectations. We went with the other couple we were traveling with and we all had a good time. I would highly recommend the dinner cruise.
City break. Lovely trip down the Danube seeing all the sights. A lovely stroll around the island and a couple of drinks in the sunshine.

Terrible service from boat captain. When we cruise close to top attractions the Parlament, the nicest scenery at night and we wanted to take as many nice photos as possible but the stupid captain drove the boat on the left side of another boat, thus the boat block our view. When turning back, the captain drove very fast and same case our boat was block by another long cruise viking on our right this time. Again no chance to take photos of Parliment and we were very disappointed with service provided by this company. Will not recommend to other tourist.

You must try this. We had a very great time on the boat . The service was exellent and the food.......... we have not had such a duckbreast anytime before and when it comes to the wine it was a complete trip on the Doanau.
A must do in Budapest!. Good service, interesting information in my own language, nice drinks and a wonderful view over Budapest from the Danube
Wonderful cruise!. We had a great cruise along the Danube! Informative staff and audioguides, and a nice drink along for the ride. Would definitely recommend to anyone interested
Legenda Dinner Cruise (evening). From start to finish, a very nice trip, with good dinner, good music entertainment and very good service.

Great location. Good trip. Not perfect though. Go on the boat trip at sunset. The buildings look great at night. Minor niggle in that I had to swap seats as the commentary would not change language. Drink was a nice touch.
Cena romantica. We spent a very nice dinner along the Danubio river,nice food and excellent service with the biggest jazz player and the city in the night.special and unforgettable moment.
Anniversary trip. We came to Budapest as a double anniversary trip with friends. Everything about the trip was fantastic from food to entertainment and staff. Highly recommend.
30th Weddibg Anniversary. Nice trip to look back on, staff were great and food was very good! We had a good few days in Budapest and chose to do this to mark our 30th Wedding Anniversary!!

varunee uksornthung from thailand. The most amizing trips and services on board is great. If I have opportunity to come back here again, I will not miss the opportunity to Legenda Sightseeing Boats again

Legenda candlelight diner and river cruise. Service and hostessing was very good. Music entertainment very charming and not too loud. We had a nice table location and enjoyed the view. The big let down was the food. Absolutely tasteless. Pumpkin soup was too watery with big lumps of cooking oil. Pork tenderloin with the egg barley risotta was terrible, overcooked and flavourless.
Evening Dinner Cruise. A great way to see the city at night and enjoy a good 4 course meal . The food was excellent and the views fantastic in daylight and when lit up at night

Tour group. Suggested by our tour guide as the "best" on the river. This boat tour came with a drink included in the price. Recommend that you make a reservation especially for the evening tours. Touring the Danube at night with the buildings lite up is beautiful. They have tvs that give you the history of the buildings you are passing as well as voice boxes with 30 different languages available.
Great tour. thanks Legenda for this tour, 1 hour is sufficient to appreciate all the monuments in the night, and with a glass of wine, it was a very nice moment.
Excellent. Great experience highly recomended. The view and the information with the headphones was amazine . Five stars

Romantic Boat Tour. We took a sightseeing tour after dark which included one drink for each of us. At first we sat inside and saw the monuments from behind a window (fairly clean), but then we decided to go outside to the top deck which was a little cold but had a far better view. (and pictures are better from there).
Anna. Nice trip with useful and interesting information about the tourist sights, which makes it more fun than just a boat trip at a touristic location.

Very nice experience. A must-do when visiting Budapest. We were very pleased by the way the cruise is organised. Free wi-fi, refreshments, and a very well designed audio system to describe the sights along the Danube. I totally recommend it, and i have an extra plus for the on-line reservation process which makes it possible to purchase your ticket even one hour prior to departure while enjoying your coffee nearby and avoid the lines at the purchase counter.
Nice trip. Service and audio guidence was good, although headphones kept falling of my head. Champagne tasted good =)
Boat Cruise in Budapest. A great cruise with fantastic service and good food on board. Will certainly recommend this anyone that visits Budapest.

Extremely beautiful but food expensive. The views, the crew, the live music and the atmosphere is magic. Really amazing. And for this you already pay 9.000 HUF (the normal cruiser, with the same except the on live music is the half). Bearing in mind that for this "extras" you have already paid in the entry ticket, I really don't see the point of over priced food. 18.000 HUF for one fish plate, one pork plate, two desserts and 2 glasses of white wine, would be acceptable is previously hadn't had paid the entry fee. A dinner for 2 people for 36.000 I think is really overpriced in Budapest. Apart from the price, the rest of the experience is very very nice.
very good. A wonderfull experience on our first evening in Budapest. Diner was fine, service excellent.Thanks very much.

Beautiful Night View of Budapest. This was one of my favorite things during my stay in Budapest. The lights along the river are magical at dusk and dark. We took the 7:30pm tour and had both. Passengers use headsets to hear descriptions of the sights and history. Seemed to work fine, but the headsets themselves didn't seem altogther sanitary.

Nice Food, excellente Service & food. We (25&24 years old ) booked this Tour because of the good rating.The view is fantastic, the service excellent and the food is good.One Point less is because of the plastic flowers and the fake dusty candle in our table.Something which was a bit sad is that we hadnt that real live music feeling because of our table on the top floor (which has the better view)All in all recommendable.

Good Danube river cruise.. This is probably the most popular cruise in Budapest, and I now see why. The price is fair (I got a student discount so I paid 4400HUF, normally it's 5500HUF) and the service is good. You get a free drink too! The process of getting the drink you want is a bit of a hassle though: they come to ask what do you want to drink, thus interrupting the beautiful cruise. It would be better if the drinks were given before the cruise starts. But that's just my opinion.

Nice trip. It was a nice trip, worth to see Budapest from the Danube. At some points there were problems with audiogudies especially about languages changing by itself but it was quickly solved. The staff was helpful too.

Excellent service on board and a beautiful sight at night. We took the Legenda Sightseeing boat for a night trip at 20:15. All popular attractions and building are beautifully lightened at that time. On the boat the tour was accompanied with movie and (individual) sound, in our own language, which was perfect for our oldest daughter (9). She was very focussed on the stories as she loves history. Because of the information given she wanted to visit the Parliament too, which we immediately booked online for the next day. Also our son (5) loved the tour.Even though both of the kids were for free, they still got a free drink during the tour. Great service!I would recommend for this boat trip to book online, so you have no worries. Worked perfectly for us.
Night Cruise on the Danube. Lovely cruise, free glass of wine, lots of information through the headphones about the tour and great value for money at only €18, would recommend.
Night in Bucarest by boat. Very pleasant meal and visit on a boat on the Donau River.And our neigbours were hungarians and very sympathetic!

Enjoyable cruise along the Danube. The cruise was well run and accommodation and seating was good. We chose to sit on top of the boat to get pictures without the reflections caused by the windows on the lower deck - if you do this in the evening, it can get a bit chilly.The cruise itself is short, but beautiful with all the sights lit up at night. The staff were all helpful and attentive. Our only negative was the audio commentary, which was stuck on Arabic for a large part of the trip. This was rectified about 15 minutes into the journey.

A must on a visit to Budapest.. Hours trip along the danube river, including drink of choice (champagne, beer juice etc) and a lemonade on the return trip to dock. Audio tour, and a chance to get off on Margaret island and get a later boat back. Friendly multilingual staff. Perfect photo opportunities along the river. Worth every penny (£8approx).

Candlelit Cruise. My husband and I enjoyed this very much indeed. The food was varied and enjoyable and the service was excellent. We read other reviews before we went and one criticism had been that the boat went back and forth on the same piece of river but we found it meant we saw things we had missed the first time and as we were eating we didn't want to spend the whole time looking out the window. The entertainment was good but I personally found it was a bit repetitive as we were on the boat for 2 1/2 hours.
awesome and beautiful. Was a great ride,good food, nice waiters and live music. Especially beautiful scenery. Highly recommended.

FRIENDLY ADVICE : TAKE THE CRUISE WITHOUT DINNER!!. The cruise on Duna river is a great experience that you will remember for ever. .So it deserve it! The boats of LEGENDA are really well equipped and nice. .....BUT.....The DINNER CRUISE just don't worth it !!As it is really expensive and tasteless!The quality and quantity is really POOR!!So just take the cruise!!

Fabulous Cruise by night. We were not sure which cruise to book but we did want an evening cruise. We spoke to concierge at our hotel who recommended this cruise. We didn't want a dinner cruise but this was also an option with this company. It cost £13 each and included full audio tour in ur choice of language and also a drink of choice. The cruise was amazing and a very interesting narration given of the most amazing sights...the palace, Chain bridge, Parliament and history of the joining of Buda and Pest. Tour lasted 1 hour, boat was immaculately clean, comfortable and had lovely attentive staff. Totally recommend this for ur river cruise in Danube.

Great Introduction, Poor Boat. Legenda's pier is located within a walking distance to M2 line. I have made a reservation on the internet before hand, so I just skip the cashier (which was empty) to broad directly.The boat was covered by transparent plastic which protects you from wind and rain. However, there was a strange smell in the boat and it was not pleasant.The drink and audio introduction were good.
Super. Very nice and interesting tour. I liked that it was also in slovene and that we got some refreshments.

Excellent food. Excellent food. Not just for a river cruise but really excellent food. Delicious and most appreciative for the complimentary champagne. 4 course inclusive well worth it. Great service and fab views on the candle lit night dinner cruise.

1st anniversary dinner in style. I was on the first anniversary trip to Budapest with my girlfriend and I came across legenda sightseeing boats while I was researching on romantic things to do in Budapest. I booked the dinner cruise at the end. As soon as we stepped on the boat, we were greeted by the lovely smiles of the welcoming and helpful staff. The boarding procedure took a while as the dinner cruise was fully booked. The best thing about this experience was the spectacular night view. Food was not bad either so overall it was a brilliant night.

Leasurely cruise, needs some refinement.. Fairly run of the mill river cruise taking in most of the key sites. Good general commentary however pretty light on detail. Boarding process was diabolical with a general free for all and little to no control. We decided to jump off mid cruise and enjoy the walk through the island gardens rather than endure the cruise cruise back. Cabin temp was pretty warm throughout, would suggest opening a window or two.
Excellent. Wonderful service and the boat ride was very smooth. The food was good and worth the value paid for.

Budapest is fantantic in the Evening!. My wife and I took the Dinner Cruise on the last night of our 10 night stay in Eastern Europe (Prague, Vienna and Budapest) and boy was it a great way to end the trip! The building along the Danube are fabulous during the day, but at night you get treated to an even extra special view.The cruise itself was nice, but it felt a bit rushed at times. Food was actually very good and service staff very attentive. We really enjoyed the live music being played by a small 3 piece band.The only criticism would be to allow a little down time, so that picture of the beautiful riverside could be taken.

Afternoon cruise with a drink on the house. This cruise is a bit more expensive than the other operators out there, but it was enjoyable. The staff are friendly and helpful. You also get a free drink on the trip. We also liked the commentary about the history of Budapest.

Superb Boat trip with great surprises. I've been on a few boat trips over the years but this is one of the best. Proper headphones were the first surprise, so much easy than the things you normally have to stick in your ears. We were offered a drink, a cold beer was great on a hot day. The commentary was very well done. Two commentators one called Buda and one Pest so that it was easier to understand which side of the river was being described. Towards the end we were then offered some very refreshing home made lemonade. A great trip.
Danube cruise. This was the highlight of our trip to Budapest,simply stunningly beautiful,the food the staff the service,all 1st class.

An amazing way to see Budapest at night!. This was the first thing we did in Budapest and it did not disappoint. The city is absolutely stunning at night. The staff were friendly and the food was very good. I would recommend this experience as a must do.

Wonderful time. My wife and I went on vacation in Budapest for several days and we went on the evening Danube cruise. We thought the food was very good as was the service. It was wonderful to see all the buildings lit up at night. We very much enjoyed it.

Loved every moment!!!. If you've been walked off your feet round Budapest and feeling like you need to sit and chill then this is a delightful way to do it. The boat is quite luxurious with it's aqua carpet and cream leather chairs and lovely staff. You're served at your seat with a drink on the way there and on the way back and can sit back and relax with your headphones on and be guided (in English or whichever language you choose) along the beauty of the Danube and all the history on both sides of the river. Clean toilets on board a major plus too! Can highly recommend this as part of your visit to Budapest.

Fantastic dinner!!!. We had a very good time on our dinner cruise.The staff was just wonderful...kind...always smiling...the food was so tasty...delicious.The service itself was fantastic.I would recommend this dinner cruise to anyone.. you will not regret.

A wonderful experience. It was a great pleasure to join this wonderful boat trip! We had the chance to see the spectacular view of the lit buildings from the heart of Budapest, the Danube River. Thank you for giving us this privilege!

Evening Dinner Cruise. We booked the 4 course a la carte dinner cruise which was worth every penny. The evening kicked off with a large complimentary glass of champagne, this was followed by 4 delicious courses whilst cruising up and down the Danube, viewing the beautifully lit parliament building, royal palace, chain bridge, fishermans bastion etc. On board the boat the staff were very polite and attentive. Very enjoyable way to spend an evening.

A trip not to be missed. We enjoyed a one hour evening cruise on board Legenda. The whole experience was excellent. The service from booking through to trip itself was professional and thorough. Our party found the audio description highly informative and it was a pleasant way to learn more of Budapest's history.

Candlelit dinner cruise. We made the reservation online two months ago and upon arrival they seemed unsure about our reservation and the staff excused herself to check again but it's resolved in a minute or two. You can choose the welcome drink (red, white, sparkling wine and beer). We had the sparkling wine which were quite nice. We paid for the four course a la carte dinner package. For starters, my bf had Hungarian cold appetitizers and he said the ham was great. I had the scallop and it was good but nothing surprising. For soup, we had pumpkin soup and the consommé with bone marrow. We both prefer the pumpkin soup more but it doesn't mean the consommé wasn't good, it's just we ain't that into the "concentrated" taste soup. For the main, we had the duck breast and the pork tenderloin and they were well cooked and meat were tender and juicy. We ordered a bottle of St Andrea Pinot Noir to go with the main and they just matched perfectly. For dessert, my bf had the panna cotta and he said it was the best wanna cotta he has ever had. I had the brownie but it was average to me since it's rather dry and I'm more into moist type of brownie. But it's just personal preference anyway. The waitress asked if we would like to have tea and coffee to go with our dessert and we said yes. At the end, we paid 8500HUF extra on top of the package (for a bottle of wine and 1 tea, 1 coffee plus service charge).For those who have the Budapest card, you would enjoy almost 20% off the ticket price. But there are no discount on the extra ordered you made on board.For the view, we were seated at the upper deck with the glass roofing. It wasn't perfectly clean but it was acceptable. And if you would like to take photo without glass reflection, you can always go downstairs to the stern through a sliding door. It was quite chilly even in April but it's warm and cozy inside and they offer you blanket if you want.Overall food was good, service was helpful and polite, beautiful view. I couldn't put it to 5 stars just because it is quite pricy (130e for two).

Surprisingly exceptional!. Went on this last night, and had a great time. The views at night were excenptional, but the surprise was the great service and the amazing food. We were expecting good but not great food, and were so surprised at the wonderful meal. All in all, very much worth the price!

evening boat cruise. very pleasant atmosphere. nice music and a delicious meal, although the entree was too small. the waitresses were kind and patient. a beautiful way to spend an evening in Budapest.

spetacular experience. there isn't anything else to say than that is was a spectacular experience. The dinner was excellent the staff great and to see Budapest at night cruising the Danube is unforgettable. Worth every penny.

Very informative tour. Had a lovely time on the Legenda cruise. The weather was lovely when I took the tour, and I was lucky enough to get a seat on the open deck. The Cruise was very well organised with audio-guides on every seat (choice of 30 languages). Got to see some different parts of Budapest that I would have missed if I hadn't taken the cruise e.g. Margaret Island. The boat makes a stop on Margaret Island, and you can disembark here and go for a walk around the island if you wish. Good was very good value (about €10), as well as the guided tour we were also given drinks during the cruise.

Good and modern ship, but the smell was uncomfortable at starting. The Ship is modern and comfortable. The service is good, the stuff is really friendly. As we´re going to the ship, unfortunately, the smell was very uncomfortable. A few minuets later, the smell was neutral. The ship has got two areas. The over area unfortunately hasn´t a roof, so if it´s rainey, you must sit in the inside, perhaps, they can think about a roof, for every ships, not just, for some ships.

Great for our guests. We took our friends who are visiting from US and they saw Budapest at night which they loves.But, as important was the wonderful food and very professional service. All was well done.
Not to be missed!. At night, when buildings are lit, is something special, I liked very much. Audio guide offers interesting information. The boats look good, are glass, offering a wide visual field.

Great view of the city. Great boat trip in heated cabin made for a good trip on Donau, a stroll on Margaret Island and great views of the city. In fact a good way to spend some hours on a rainy cold day in Budapest.

Great way to see the city.. I booked a candle lit dinner cruise whilst in Budapest, and it exceeded all expectations. The staff were friendly, the service good, and the food was really tasty. There was music playing on board which added to the wonderful atmosphere. It was lovely seeing the city from a different perspective, and I would thoroughly recommend this, particularly to add a little romance to your trip!
Fabulous!. My husband and I went with friends on the candlelit evening dinner cruise. We loved it. Delicious food, well priced drinks and superb views. Would definitely recommend

Budapest by night is breathtaking. The evening dinner cruise was fabulous! We pre-booked online before our trip and we weren't disappointed. The food was lovely, the staff were friendly, Hungarian wine is delicious and cruising up and down the Danube taking in all the sights is perfect. This is a must for anyone visiting Budapest, I would highly recommend it.
Excellent. Awesome food and ambiance. The boat was very hot though had to take off my stockings so warm. So dress light ! Everything else was fantastic

A nice trip. The staff were friendly. We were greeted well at the entrance. The welcome drink was a little diluted and champagne was a sparkling wine. We would have been happy with sparkling wine, but think this should be stated as such. The tour guide was good and informative. Overall it was a nice trip.
Excellent value. Service great food good cruise was a nice length giving plenty of time to eat and see the sights.A very pleasant. Experience .

Budapest Dinner Cruise. The Legenda dinner cruise was well worth it. Although the meal was pricier than most in Budapest all of the meals looked well prepared and well presented. The dinners we had were excellent. The cruise itself was great. The view of Budapest at night from a he river was simply beautiful. We highly recommend this as a way to cap off your stay. Julie and Rob - Montreal
Beautiful view. evening walk was magical,Champagne was popular))) The organization of the cruise in order We and our children loved it

Beautiful night cruise. The cruise gave us a beautiful view of Budapest at night. The views were beautiful, with an option of staying in the comfortable and warm enclosed glass area or heading up top on the deck. Crew was great and boat was extremely smooth.
Beautyful. Very nice to make the trip in dark. All the buildings and bridges were lightening.This boat was super because a lot of talloze glasservice windows.
Top cruise. We have had a beautiful rivercruise at night. Trip was not too long and to-the-point information in your own language. Free drink included, so 100% OK!
Fabulous. Wonderful evening on the Danube. Lovely staff, great food excellent value for money. Would definitely use Legenda again.
Stunning. Everything was perfect; food, staff, the views. Couldn't have asked for a better first night in Budapest.
Fun night out. This was an enjoyable conclusion to our trip. I'd suggest booking the dinner in with the ticket for convenience.
Excellent value money. I would highly recommend the evening candle lit dinner cruise. Very good food and friendly staff. The views from the boat when you're sat eating your meals are excellentl.
Evening sight seeing cruise. Great cruise and well worth paying a little extra go s boat that gives such good visibility. I highly recommend it.

What a lovely tour!. We enjoyed it so much, a drink to start with and great boat to see from down below or up top on the open deck! The guided tour was good but a little off on the timing! But you knew what it was on about! The views from up top near the parliament building were like nothing we could have imagined! You need to see it from the water and this was great way to!

Perfect evening and romantic cruise. Already arriving on the boat was a happening: very friendly personnel accompanied us to our table. Dinner was delicious, view of the Budapest highlights close to perfect and live music created a pleasant and romantic athmosphere! Very recommendable!
Great experience in Budapest. It was very nice experience in Budapest. They provided good sightseeing tour and delicious food. It is worthy for when you travel here.
Legenda Sightseeing Boats. A great experience at night along the Danube with a drink.Luxurious ship with very nice staff.Recommended especially at night
Awesome. Solid boat engineering. I specifically pleased with the quality of glass used for the panoramic windows.

Birthday Dinner Cruise. We booked the candlelit cruise prior to our visit to Budapest. It was fairly easy process via emails. We arrived by 7.15pm to board the boat and were allocated a table on the upper deck, which I initially thought was not what I wanted, but to be fair, we had the best views and the waitresses were superb with their service. The food was beautifully presented, the choice is excellent. We were both very impressed. We purchased a bottle of wine on board which was roughly £10, very good value! My husband ordered a birthday candle and during the dessert service the live music singer sang "happy birthday" and the waitress presented the amazing pud! A lovely touch. The views along the Danube are fantastic, so much to see, we were able to take photos with no problem. I've read some previous comments and I don't think it necessary to have a running commentary describing the buildings etc., I want to enjoy a lovely meal with moving scenery listening to the serenading music! My suggestion is to read your guide book then you'd know what you are looking at!

Great river cruise on the Danube . We did the evening cruise and it was a wonderful way to see the city at night. The commentary was great with very helpful staff. The movie documentary on the tour was very well made and informative.

Excellent dinner cruise!!. I booked this dinner cruise as a birthday surprise for my boyfriend. I booked it and paid for it months in advance and asked at the time of booking for a window seat, which we did get. I also mentioned it was his birthday in the booking, and they must have taken note of us this because at the end of the Meal they brought out a birthday dessert and candle and sang happy birthday. As I'd booked this like three months in advance, I'd actually forgotten that I had mentioned his birthday to them so this was a lovely surprise for both of us!!I'm so glad I chose this for his birthday night, it was great. Really romantic and great food! I'm a reasonably fussy eater, but I enjoyed all the food!! The views were spectacular and an experience we won't ever forget!
Candlelight dinner cruise on Danube. Dinner cruise on Danube was excellent choice for our 20th anniversary. Ala carte food tasty, wines good and sights looked nice with lights on. Thank you :)

Cheaper available.. We were advised this by our hotel (obvious expensive alert). This is located on Pest, Dock 7. Last trip is 21:30. We did the evening Legend trip which was 11K ft for 2 people. You can choose to sit on the top deck on plastic chairs (cold at night!) or lower deck on the comfy chairs. There is a free audio-guide which gives a history of Budapest and each landmark that you pass, although sometimes it's not to clear what you're suppose to be looking at. They have a TV screen which also shows a visual to go with the guide. You will receive a free drink onboard (champagne, soft drink or beer) that is brought to you. There is WiFi on board, but the further away you are from the front, the worse it is. You'll be taken as far as the Palace of Arts and back to Margaret Island which takes an hour. It's a nice scenic and quiet tour, but there are much cheaper available that offer food with the price or club music. Have a walk/look down the river before you choose.
Great views on evening cruise. Views on the candlelight dinner cruise were amazing. Ala carte dinner was ok, list promised more, but food was nothing special but eatable. Service was good.

Good view of attractions alongside Danube but a bit expensive. There are tons of sightseeing cruises along the Danube but we chose this one based on reputation and review scores - turns out it wasn't particularly special and I think we could have gotten a similar experience going with one of the less expensive options. Nothing wrong with it, it's just overpriced.

Good value, informative and beautiful at night. We did this on our first night in Budapest and enjoyed seeing the city by night. We chose. It was good value for money and there's a free audio guide on board which was very informative and gave us ideas about where we wanted to explore the next day. We were given a free glass of wine/beer/ soft drink as part of the price. Highly recommend this cruise.

Excellent experience and value for money. After looking at the various boat trips available in Budapest, we settled on Legenda (based on how their boats were equipped) although it was slightly more expensive than a few others we had seen. The trip did not let us down. The boat trip was very comfortable, both on the upper open air deck and down stairs. The service was excellent and the drinks provided (twice) were of good quality. The commentary on the audio guide was good and engaging. We were on the last day time trip at 18:30 Hrs and hence got to see the city by day time, twilight and night!

Wonderful dinner cruise on the Danube. Visiting Budapest in early April we decided to try the Legenda dinner cruise on the Danube. The food , service and sightseeing were great. The food was actually better than we expected. You can purchase the cruise (includes sparkling wine welcome drink) and purchase dinner items separately.

Disapointing; it did not live up to expectations. We booked the Legenda a la carte evening dinner cruise, sailing at 7.45pm and taking 2.5 hours. We expected that the meal would take approximately 1-1.5 hours, with the remainder of the time spent outside (or looking through open windows), taking photos of the sights and buildings. All while being serenaded by the live band.Unfortunately it was not to be. The meal took the full 2.5 hours and we were finishing the dessert just prior to docking. The soup was nothing special, the main course (veal cheeks and the duck) was delicious, but the dessert was the smallest piece ever served in the history of miniature desserts.We were sat upstairs with 6 other tables, covered completely by plexiglass windows. It was very difficult to take photos, not least because of the reflections of the lights from inside the boat. These stayed on the entire journey. There was nowhere to take photographs outside and no time as we were ordering or eating food.The diners who were sat downstairs presumably enjoyed the live singer. We never saw her, although she sounded reasonable over the loudspeaker. There is no commentary at any time during the cruise.If I had known that it was completely covered over, with lights reflecting off the windows, that we would be sat upstairs with a few others, that we could not see the singers or other diners, that photos could not be taken outside and that the meal would take 2.5 hours I would have simply booked a different cruise that had open air views (there are many available) and eaten onshore before sailing.This cruise was meant to be the highlight of our stay on our last evening. We dearly wanted a special experience, but unfortunately it did not live up to our expectations and we were left disappointed.
Evening cruise. We took the last cruise at 930 and it was the best way to see the two sides lit up well worth the money and a free drink to and good audio guide

Fantastic way to see the sights. Myself and partner along with another couple all in our mid twenties; had a wonderful sit down dinner on the legenda. Wonderful relaxed atmosphere with on board music and very attentive staff. The food was great, I had the duck which was definitely causing some serious food envy on our table, the only thing better were the views; absolutely breathtaking all lit up at night, especially the parliament building.

It is a must. As a budapestcard holder we had 20percent dicount, and we had that night tour. It was only one hour but any minute of it was like paradise. We have seen most of attraction , and enjoyed. I recommend it to everybody visiting budapest.

Candlelit Dinner Cruise. I booked this for my wife's birthday what an excellent choice travel down the river at night being served a 4 course a'la carte dinner. whilst the band played in the back ground.the ambiance was amazing the food was exceptional and the service just brilliant and the band were good.very welcoming staff and very attentive but with out being intrusive.the band even played happy birthday for my wife as she was served desert.a super way to see such a beautiful city at night.

A nice time to relax and enjoy the view. The Legenda boat provides nice seating, a refreshment such a wine, audio narration and a movie to guide you through the Danube and it's landmarks. Suggest taking it at night so you can see the buildings light up. All this for about $20/person.

lovely trip at night. We took a 19.30 trip , wanted it to be dark to appreciate the lights. We didnt book , just rolled up. There was plenty of space on the ship. The windows are large and the commentary was pretty good (if a little off subject at times) . We really enjoyed the trip and the views of the castle, churches, bridges, parliament etc are excellent. The boat was nice and warm. The free drink is a nice touch .

Candle light dinner cruise. Well, this was one of the most fantastic things I've experienced! Fabulous service from excellently spoken waitresses who were charming, quick, caring and efficient. The boat was beautiful inside and a romantic atmosphere created. Fab band with a talented guitarist and beautiful voice- right volume and tone of music. Beautiful views of Budapest lit up at night. And the food- wow! Some of the most wonderfully cooked food I've ever eaten! Absolutely wonderful evening!

A very relaxing trip on the Danube!. Went for a trip with Legenda. If was a beautiful sunny day - very welcoming staff. Headphones supplied to give you all the information you needed of everything of interest along the way. You were served with a drink of your choice on the way and lemonade on the way back. You were able to leave the boat at Margaret Island to look round - well worth it and then catch another boat back. Would recommend this trip.

Four Course Gourmet Dinner Cruise a Must!. We booked the four course gourmet dinner cruise a couple of months in advance. Not knowing exactly what to expect, we were amazed at what we got! The menu was varied, and absolutely five star by any restaurant standards. Service was impeccable, presentation was incredible, food was delicious and atmosphere unbeatable. This was a great experience, and while fairly expensive, not any more so than any great restaurant.

High level cruise.. Me and my husband took the night cruise at 20:00, the ship was clean, wide and comfortable, and with a big windows all over. We enjoyed every minute there and even in the cold winter we filled very warm. We are definitely recommend.

Fabulous evening. We booked an evening dinner cruise with Legenda and had a wonderful evening from start to finish.Well organised when you board. we had a great table and very helpful and delightful hostess. Food was of a very high standard and great choice.Fabulous music from a trio of talented musicians.If you want a memorable evening in Budapest do not hesitate to book.

Drinks Cruise - Waste of Time!. We chose to take the cruise with a welcome drink (on the recommendation of our hotel, regrettably) - we didn't want a dinner as we wanted to choose from the many restaurants in the city whilst we were there. Unfortunately, this was a really poor experience. We had to walk through the dinner boat to get to our boat - it was beautifully set up and looked romantic and classy. However, our boat was no better than a bus, with windows so grubby you had to go outside to take pictures (in March, it was cold!). How can you run a sightseeing boat without clean windows? There was also a cheesy information video which meant you kept getting up and down to take pictures, then listen to the video. This could be so much improved if they made it like the dinner boat but with high bar tables. Make it classy and pleasant to be on. Do away with the video. Let people buy extra drinks from the bar if they would like to. Create an atmosphere. Sadly this trip did not meet any of my expectations. I cannot work out who they are trying to appeal to with this - it's not a party boat, nor particularly informative, nor atmospheric. It was just nothing.When it's this bad you may as well walk the river at night to see the sights - the views are just as good. Unless they are going to attempt to make it a special experience this really is a waste of time and money.

Great way to see the stoning skyline. Budapest is beautiful by night and there is no better way to see it than a cruise on the Danube. You are provided with individual headphones for commentary explaining the highlights of the city. You also get a free drink onboard.

Romantic birthday dinner. I booked the evening dinner cruise for my girlfriends birthday, we were lucky enough to be given a window table even though we were last on. There was a welcome drink included in the price. For starters, I had scallops and my girlfriend had the shrimps, both were very tasty. This was followed by soup, we both had the pumpkin and toasted pine nuts which we enjoyed. For the main, I had pork tenderloin and my girlfriend had venison, both of which were nicely cooked and well presented. We both chose the brownie for dessert which were more like soufflés and delicious! The evening was accompanied by some live music which was great. The only problem was the rain on the Windows obstructing the view of the sights - it prompted a discussion about windscreen wipers that could be operated by a lever inside...

A little cheesy but fun all the same.. We went on one of the night boat trips. It was a small group so it was nice to be able to pick where to sit and move around freely. The views were beatiful and we were lucky with the weather. The commentary is a little on the cheesy side but didn't take away from the enjoyment of the trip. The welcome drink was a nice touch.
Beautiful Night Cruise. A lovely nighttime river cruise on the Danube. Very informative and a nice clean boat. This is a must when visiting the city.

Good Cruise. We went on the day time cruise with the stop at Margaret Island. Being early March the boat was pretty empty which was a bonus. The commentary was OK but nothing special - I would like to have known what more of the buildings are rather than just the major sites.The ticket includes a free drink which was a nice touch. We caught the next boat back from Margaret so had an hour and a half to explore. Plenty of time believe me - see separate review.No commentary on the way back. Just music and a glass of "lemonade".A nice way to spend an afternoon in Budapest.

Amazing to see the City at night from the Danube. Informative and increibly scenic cruise, a lovely way to spend an hour before dinner BUT please get rid of the TV screens. They create reflections on the windows and I really don't grasp the point of having them on the boat when one of the world's most iconic and beautiful cities is rising up all around you. If we went again, I think it'd be worth paying a little extra and going on one of the dining boats which looked great and didn't have tvs!

Dinner Cruise. Good way to spend an evening.Food very good for being on a boat, well presented and prepared.Boat just goes up and down between about 4 bridges, however plenty to see and possibly the best lit up buildings.
Brill . Really lovely cruise ☺ food fabulous and very friendly staff ☺☺ music brilliant ☺☺ very comfortable and

Definitely worth the ticket price!. So we were given this leaflet in our welcome pack. We were staying in Budapest over Valentine's Day and thought it would be perfect as our valentines night (long story short they were fully booked so we chose a different day in hindsight we should have booked in advance).We chose the evening candlelit exclusive dinner option. Were told the boat would be leaving at 19:00 so we arrived in plenty of time.When being shown to our seat on the boat we found we were on the top 'deck' with 3 other couples so very intimate and even better view so this was a massive bonus.The boat took a little time to set off but we soon got on our way and our orders were taken straight away. As we had the exclusive dinner we had all 4 course orders taken at one time so we had to chose quickly and all together (luckily we'd already decided what we wanted).The food came out swiftly one meal after another, as we were quite secluded we thought we might have been left and service was poor but boy were we wrong! The food was very gourmet and very very yummy. The views on the boat are from another world, Budapest at night is 100000x more beautiful than during the day.We paid 18,600 forint which works out around £47.00. In this price was a 4 course a la Carte meal and a welcome drink. I thought the portions were going to tiny and pretty but safe to say I was stuffed! I had a glass of wine for my welcome drink, very tasty and very large at that. It was slightly chilly as we were on the top however blankets were supplied and we soon warmed up after dinner.Overall thoroughly impressed and enjoyed our boat cruise.There are other cheaper options on this cruise and also other cruises available to suit everyone. 100% must whilst staying in Budapest.

Perfect boat trip. We had a very relaxing trip aboard the “Duna Bella”. The boat was relatively empty as it was early February. We sat on the upper deck which offered good views across to both sides of the river. Comfortable seats and lots of legroom. The commentary was nicely put together with lots of interesting facts about historic Budapest. This is a great way to see the sights, and in our view an essential part of our trip to this fantastic city.

Magical Dinner Cruise. This really was an incredible finish to my week in the city. I booked the dinner cruise including the a la carte 4 course meal. The cruise takes you up and down the Danube several times past the parliament building, royal palace, island and all the amazing sights on the river which look just as impressive at night. Aboard the boat the staff were highly trained - proudly multi lingual, attentive servers and very polite. The food was great too. The meal came with a free drink which unlike most free drinks was enormous (my glass of champagne was the size of a large glass of wine). After that the drinks menu was pretty reasonable. They had a great blues/folk band that were perfect for the ambience. I was travelling alone and so having been unable to find anyone in my hostel to join me so was the only one by myself, but this made absolutely no difference and I still enjoyed the evening immensely. If someone was planning a anniversary weekend break here though I couldn't recommend the dinner cruise enough.First class.

Let the Danube tell you a story.... Whenever I have guests visiting from abroad, I take them to a sightseeing cruise on the Danube. With or without dinner, either just the hour long or the longer trip, it has been always the most joyous and memorable of all the city experiences.Never disappointed!

Great value. Had a wet rainy Monday in Budapest and as all the museums are closed decided to do the afternoon sightseeing cruise.It was good value, nice and relaxing and informative way to see the city from the Danube. The staff were all polite, friendly and helpful

Excellent Danube - Budapest trip!. Highly recommended ! Very organised and friendly trip ! You can learn so many things about the history of Budapest ! You can have a drink to enjoy your cruise included (champagne , wine , beer etc)!

Would highly recommend! . Great value, attentive and friendly staff / service, delicious food. The dining cruise is a must in order to see the sights of Budapest all lit up at night - I'm so glad we did this on our last night in the city!

Fabulous experience. This was the highlight of the trip for our party. The city looks amazing at night from the boat. We pre-booked a dinning package which was very good value. The food is absolutely delicious. The staff are friendly and attentive and the entertainment is very good.

Professional and amazing. It's a very fantastic experience: it's organized in a way very fine that allows you to understand what is the vest places in Budapest. The guide is in many languages and you can understand all and how to visit Budapest.I advise it

Wonderful Evening. Took a fantastic cruise with a wonderful dinner. Staff were friendly and knowledgeable. Cruise was lovely with great views of the sites and the city. Food amazing. This is a must do to see Budapest from a different angle.

It's a must!. My son and I went on the Christmas Day river cruise (eve) with dinner and live music.Firstly, with all good intention, we arrived late, 7.15pm instead of 7pm. The boat had left on time but returned to pick us up, so impressed, we would have missed out greatly if it hadn't.Can't praise this enough, the scenery was spectacular as so many beautiful buildings are lit up at night. Being on a glass domed boat was such a plus.The food (four courses) was the best we had anywhere in Budapest during our 10 day stay. Complements to the chef! All the staff were friendly and it was obvious they had everything well under control. The singer, so good, really didn't want him to stop.Thanks to all of you for making Christmas Day so special!

Amazing sights of Budapest at night time. My boyfriend booked the night time river cruise hosted by Legenda Sightseeing Boats via Expedia the travel company prior to our visit to Budapest. We had a lovely time, enjoying seeing Budapest at night which was spectacular. The cruise was accompanied with a choice of drink, a glass of champagne for me and beer for my boyfriend - a lovely extra included in the price. Staff very friendly and welcoming and speak lots of languages to suit all. A must visit when in Budapest!

Enjoyable boat. We really enjoyed this boat with my boyfriend on NYE, but during the day I would prefer the regular boat transportation, which is included in your daily ticket (instead of 18e ticket). But at the evening - worth to visit.
Beautiful way to see Budapest . Staff very welcoming and good value for money. It's a lovely way to see Budapest and at night it's simply stunning.. next time we will have the dinner boat ride x

Perfect romantic evening. Just had a lovely candlelight meal at this beautiful cruise boat. Excellent service, very good meal from start until the end, definitely recommend to anybody coming to budapest. The views were spectacular, very good priced menu and the live music was very enjoyable.

Good Photo ops. Although it was a very cold night, but we were plenty warm inside the boat. Was a perfectly clear night with fabulous views of all that is along the Danube. The windows were a bit dirty, but managed to get some good photos.
A lovely meal with great views. When booking a city river cruise, you always feel that there has to be a compromise....not on this one! The food, service, entertainment and views were brilliant.

New Year's Eve Candlit dinner cruise. Absolutely amazing, booked this before we went to Budapest, didn't know what to expect but wanted a reservation to eat somewhere New Year's Eve, we went for the exclusive menu which included a four course meal. The food snd service was excellent made a very memorable New Year's Eve.

The best way to spend an evening. We went for the dinner package which includes a 4 course meal. We enjoyed this on New Years Eve and it was amazing to drift along and see the fireworks. The buildings are so beautifully lit at night and best enjoyed from the river. The food was delicious and the service fantastic. Couldn't recommend highly enough.

Wonderful, romantic evening dinner cruise. This is a must-do when you're in Budapest, as it's a unique and beautiful way to experience the city: in the evening, when it's all lit up, on a beautiful boat (covered with a glass dome, so it's not cold), with delicious food and wine, and listening to a live band for 2.5 hours.
